DOWNLOAD the app for FREE now and don't miss amazing NEW CONTENT on periodic UPDATES. If you like fighting games, you will love the cool Sniper 3D game! Take down the bad guy from his fantasy, and get the glory for saving the victim. The final word is with you, and the rules are clear: aim and shoot!

Forget those dumb, repetitive shooting games. Here, your duty will include racing against time, exploding helicopters in American cities, killing zombies and quite a few shots in slow motion. Survival is necessary! But can you solve the puzzle, save the victims and kill only the right target hidden in the crowd? Can you stop the virus from spreading? You received the call for duty of saving the people.

Read what millions of extremely happy players have say about Sniper 3D. Check out our reviews!

Sniper 3D Assassin® is brought to you by Fun Games For Free.

The best first person shooter (fps) action game! Be the best professional sniper in every environment! The combat is real, and you can be the hero.

● Hundreds of mission:
"Alpha, Bravo, Charlie, do you copy?" Find the target, aim, shoot.
Save the state secrets from the rogue agents and spies, and stop them from spreading a terrible virus. Do you have the skills? Help your country in the massive nuclear competition. Be accurate and save the hostages and victims of the enemy.

● Start racing to kill a zombie army and prevent global war and destruction. Don't leave any zombie alive: start to shoot and kill them all! Are you prepared to all the action and adventure in this awesome fps shooting game? Can you guarantee the survival of the human race?

● Unlock awesome weapons and upgrade them with evolutions in the arsenal:
Buy the best Sniper rifles, assault rifles, shotguns or Pistols that exist with the gem you earn in the game! Upgrade the ammo, the grip, the calibre to get bullets that inflict more damage, better range, scope, stability, or zoom. Will you choose the hunting rifle, the awesome assault mp5 or a gun Glock or colt in the armory?

● Play it anywhere
Sniper 3D does not require you to be always online in order to have fun. You can enjoy it offline in the subway, while flying on a (real) plane, in the car on the road, during services in a temple (or maybe even on toilet!). From time to time, it may be necessary to download additional (free) content online.

● PvP mode
Try out the pvp mode: prepare your gun and hunt your enemy. You should kill him first. The pvp mode will test your speed in killing and hunting. Take long and you will be dead. Get into action now and enjoy the adventure in this top shooting game! Follow the rules of your training and act!

● Limited data usage
Our game will not consume tons of data from your mobile plan that you'd want to use instead to surf the web, watch youtube videos and listen to free music. Have fun with limited data usage.

● Disclaimer
Sniper 3D Assassin® is a free game but it contains mature content and optional in-app purchases for real money. You may want to keep away it from your kids and younger boys

comments: This game should be avoided. They don't care about what the players think and refuse to make improvements or adjustment players suggest. Progress is slow and even if you spend real money your odds of getting what you want is low.  Avoid starting at a costs. It is not worth your time.

It is impossible to have a good team without spending lots of money.  In order to have a good team you need 4 star level robots which even when you do get a chance to get one, you will end up with a duplicate which will be liquidated for just about nothing. Hence better players get better and lower level players stay at the bottom. Also players that spend alot tend to get better chances on draws that are supposed to be random. Wow that's a surprise

This game is a lot of fun. Great time killer. The only thing I think could be improve is the fact that you can't upgrade your bots with duplicates you get in the space bridge. And possibly better mechanics to see the bots you have walking around your base. Other than that. It's amazing.

Updated. Games are supposed to be fun, if u play this game be prepared for a complete lack of respect for its user Base from the devs and a lack of fun events. Even those spending 1000s are bored  Don't start spending as the game is dying Don't expect good support from the game makers either who seem to be on a mission to put off it's older users to the point of stopping them playing the game. Ps dont expect many players as a deception. Pps #saveferal

First off, if you do not want duplicates, do _not_ spend any money on anything other than maybe another builder bot and don't waste any of your cyber coins on crystals until you get all of your builder bots.   So long as you don't care about getting dupes the game is fun. And you will get so very many many many dupes, often times the same bot in a row. Fortunately, the somewhat new cores help take away the pain of getting dupes.  Personally, I enjoy the strategic and alliance parts of this game a lot and the events are fun so long as you don't care about placement on the leaderboard. Having a good alliance helps a lot by the way. Don't be afraid to look around for ones that boot leaches.

You save up to get new players for months that are three stars when you only have 11 of the 160 of the characters and then you turn in you three star crystals you have been saving for months and the next 2 of the next 3 characters are duplicates.  11 of 160. What are the odds. That upset me. Game is almost rigged so you don't get any good characters.

comments: Overall great game. Amazing battle systems and gameplay. A very challenging game that would encourage you to seek others allegiance to conquer other kingdoms. Unfortunately, i have one issue i can't access the chat room, no messages, cant access mh own profile. It keeps saying network error even though i am currently playing the game smoothly. If you can fix this i would gladly appreciate

If you put gold army in your garrison troops its impossible to invade you even the attacker is highest level. Attacking castle is very costly you need to attack many times for few resources. The shop is sucks. Too much chines character. I dont know my goal at all. Etc.. So many issue for this game needs lot's of improvement.

I think I would like this game but somehow I have never played it or downloaded it until today but the game is not at the beginning and I keep getting kicked off as it says I have logged into another device.  Not the first time I have ran into this problem.  Please help me fix this.  I have cleared the game data uninstalled and all that nonsense.

i would rate it 5* but i can only play the game on wifi. unable to play on Data. Asus Zenfone 3 Zoom....so i got a new phone but still required me to start up the game with WiFi then i can play on data. very annoying.
Still lags like crazy slow gameplay when will the new race be introduced the lags are becoming too much especially when entering a dungeon and why can't some heroes be bought with lanari

descriptionHTML:
Featured globally by Google Play!

◆ "This new strategy game gives you full control in a world full of dwarves, magic, and monsters. It’s the perfect marriage of MMO and strategy" - PocketGamer

◆ "Art of Conquest could very well be the mobile game fantasy and strategy fans have been waiting for " - App Spy

◆ "Players take full control of the battle. Art of Conquest is a breath of fresh air in the world of base-building strategy games"- 148Apps

◆ "The mobile RTS I never knew I wanted to play"- HaoGamers

◆ "A fascinating mix of many disparate genres all mixed into one title"- TouchArcade

◆ "A genre hybrid that blends RPG, RTS and MMO together to create something special" - DVS Gaming

◆"AoC reminds me of strategy games I played as a kid, but with much better gameplay and perfect for the mobile platform"- Kripparrian, Twitch & Youtube Content Creator


Explore a huge magical world!

Besiege enemy strongholds to expand your kingdom, slay nefarious dragons with a band of legendary heroes, and challenge players around the world to epic real-time battles!

FEATURES

● CHALLENGE your friends to thrilling real-time duels
● COMMAND hundreds of individual troops on a single - breathtaking field of battle
● SUMMON dozens of mythical heroes, each endowed with powerful abilities
● CHOOSE from five mighty races to raise your army
● BUILD your stronghold and besiege the enemy
● SIX embittered kingdoms strive to survive
● EXPLORE the beautiful, hand-crafted world of Nore
● DEFEAT evil bosses and loot unfathomable rewards

Facebook：https://www.facebook.com/artofconquest
Twitter：https://twitter.com/Art_of_conquest
Official Website：http://artofconquest.com

comments: The music is beautifully relaxing, but then you get blasted after every round with the ad music. Couldn't the music keep playing or have ads with no blaring music??? I am enjoying this relaxing, mind game however, I had to reset my phone and all my progress was lost...not cool! I've contacted the developers / company twice with no fix offered yet.üòîüòï Hoping to get an accommodation and a way to avoid this issue in the future!

This is a pretty awesome app which makes our mind to formulate words with the given letters. But many a times we come across words for which we are unaware of the meaning. If you guys can create a small block on the screen which displays the meaning of the last word created/accepted. Then this app will become an ultimate learning app or say vocabulary building app as well. Hoping to see the enhancement is sometime near future.

If I could give zero stars I would. This game was great to pass time and a good game for a brain teaser. But recently bought a new phone and even though I signed into Facebook it did not save me levels coins or anything else that I worked so hard to get. It reset me back to the beginning. So never buy a new phone if you don't want to start over.

I really enjoy playing. Addictive even my husband downloaded!  My only frustration is that myself an him paid for no ads however he seems to get perks such as extra random coins an i dont! Why?? The game is good but doesnt feel consistent for all.

The advertisement I saw for this game, WASNT EVEN THIS GAME. I downloaded it expecting a different time of word game, looked like a whole bunch of Scrabble word tiles lined up and you'd choose words. This game is nothing like that. Its ok, but very misleading advertisement and disappointed in that.

It's fun and cute. I like that it gets harder as you progress. Edit: March 17th, 2018. There was an ad after you completed a level and that was fine. That's how it was last night and usually the ads were quick. Now there is an add at the very bottom of your game which really makes it difficult to concentrate and you accidentally click it every time you shuffle your letters. This was 5 stars, but now it's going to have to be 3. That, to me, is very annoying and eventually I'll stop playing altogether as a result.

descriptionHTML:
Connect letters in a level and finish a word. So entertaining and totally for free!
You have surely played many word games and been invincible.
Now there is a completely new word link game waiting for you to take the challenge! Want to prove your skills?

Word Crossy combines word search and crossword style games. By Connecting letters, you get a complete word and fill it into a crossword blank. This is only the first step! If you want to win, you still need to find all the words hidden in the crossword. Challenge yourself and train your brain.

Feature:
- Easy to play and amusing, Connecting words to build a complete word.
- More than 300 levels and multiple words to search for.
- Crossword style to make the game experience even more interesting.
- The degree of difficulty increasing according to player’s progress.
- No time limits.
- Letters redraw and useful hints when needed.
- Beautiful visual experience.

How do I play?
- Connect the letters on the wheel to get a correct word.
- Find all the words and fill in the crossword blanks.

Play Word Crossy to train your brain, let your free time be more fun!

NOTES
• "Word Crossy" is free to play, but you can purchase In-app items like coins.
developerAddress: Lindley Ave. Juneau, AK
recentChanges: We hope you‚Äôre having fun playing Word Crossy! We update the game every week so don't forget to download the latest version to get all the  new features and levels!
1.  More Levels updated with background & UI beautified
2.  Holiday SALE: Special discount event for Easter! Get more coins with same price!
3.  Game experience optimized.
Thanks for your feedback and keep it coming!
e-mailÔºöWord_Crossy@outlook.com
summary: A funny crossword game. Connect letters in a level and finish a word.
title: Word Crossy - A crossword game

comments: Customer service does not reply nor do they address issues. So keep that in mind when in app purchase are charged to your account but items fail to be uploaded to tour device. This app has a long road of updates and improvements before it can be considered to be a game worth playing.
Pack buying glitches, Game glitches,  non responsive customer service.  Too bad they are ripping off some genuinely nice people.  DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS GAME  AT ALL...VenusFlytrap

Bought a 48.99 eve of war pack but never received it.  Customer support does not respond.  This could be a good game but until they fix the pack buying glitches and customer support the game will not survive. And now you can't even log in lol. I won't be recommending this game to anyone now!!

I have been leaving messages in game and also through the customer service email but still have not received a response. Could someone please contact me conversation name JOYCEY  Edit: you have responded to other people's reviews please respond to this one, I am 70.99 out of pocket with nothing for it and nearly a week one I've received no support at all - 2nd edit Day 8 and no sign of my purchase and no customer support except a "you'll get your purchase soon sorry for trouble" which I received about 12hrs ago, I'm less than hopeful ..

descriptionHTML:
Become the Supreme King in Game of Kings: The Blood Throne, the newest FREE real-time strategy, and MMO of 2017!
Gather your Resources, Build your Empire, Train your Warriors, Lead your Armies, Destroy your Enemies, Sit on the Throne and Dominate the World on your Phone!
Game of Kings: The Blood Throne is completely FREE to play!

***AWESOME CHRISTMAS GIFTS***
To celebrate a wonderful 2017 Christmas GOK’s developers decided to prepare many events and FREE gifts for all players. Starting from Thursday 21st until January 2nd GOK players will find a beautiful Christmas environment and a beautiful Christmas tree in the middle of the city, will also have the opportunity to:
✔ Collect FREE gift from December 25th. Tap the Christmas tree to receive your big gift.
✔ New monsters to fight in the map with new materials to get.
✔ 2017 Xmas Special Gear. Players will have the opportunity to get new powerful gears, be sure to get yours fast because they will disappear at the end of Christmas event.
✔ Cross Kingdom Royal Rumble. Wage war to to other players from all the other servers.
✔ Play the Roulette and have a chance to get wonderful items. One free spin a day is on the house.
✔ GOK will enlist the best players in a yearly ranking position list and reward them with special badges and trophies.
✔ Pictures sharing competition and 3 different kind of rewards.


Game of Kings: The Blood Throne features:
✔ Players vs. Players Epic Wars.
✔ Explore the world map, seek and attack different Monsters and get precious prizes.
✔ Gather 6 different kinds of resources (food, iron, stone, wood, silver and gold) to use to build and upgrade buildings, train armies and research new technologies.
✔ Gather hundred of thousands of soldiers among Swordsman, Archers, Knights and Siege Machines, in 4 increasingly powerful tiers! Attack other players and defend your Empire!
✔ Create or join alliances and wage war to other coalitions, win them all and dominate the Kingdom! Make friends with other players, develop together and fight your common enemies like brothers!
✔ Forge Epic and Legendary weapons to become immensely powerful!
✔ Power up your Hero with 2 different skill trees system.
✔ No language barriers! Talk to anyone freely with our real-time in chat translation of 34 different languages.
✔ Frequent events with free gifts and engaging activities.


Game of Kings: The Blood Throne is completely free to play, however some items still can be purchased with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable this function in your device or the setting of store.
For any questions or comments, please contact us via Email: gameofkingsservice@gmail.com

comments: Would be 5 stars if I could get back into the game. Have tried uninstalling but it still keeps crashing after the loading screen. A Mikaela screen comes up with a Start Download button and it crashes on this screen.  Update: I can't login on your website to log a ticket with your support team.

I do miss the old LOA - Fire Raider style of art and play, just came back after maybe a year or so and it was gone! But, Paradise seems pretty cool so far, only thing I'm not a big fan of is how everything deals with irl money while in the 'old' one you could build up gems or materials for certain things like VIP levels; also I heard about rewards being given to old players like me? That's pretty cool, will have to check that out... But yea, so far I like the game, miss the old style but it's still good to me, will update this later on when I play more.
Gave you people an opportunity to fix the stupid chibi icon characters. The latest update didn't fix that so uninstalled.  Also do not reply with a generic response cause you can kiss my ass

Only challenging for nonpaying playing. Not a big fan of pay to win games. But LoA is always addicting and just makes you want to spend your money. Not suitable if you're addicted to that overall. More nonpaying support would be reasonable for them to at least be able to compete.

Latest updates just added more to this already enjoyable game.  However I wouldn't encourage new players to spend any money on the game as the benefits are nonexistant for what you pay. Which means a limited lifespan for the game if no one is paying.  Still a good game to enjoy on a mobile device.

descriptionHTML:
Get Ready for the Holidays with Google Play’s Festive Updates!

Endorsed By Gal Gadot! An Epic Fantasy RPG Adventure！

An eternal cycle of conflict has turned the world of Elysium upside down. The endless power struggle has finally toppled the Angels from their place as the aristocracy. But this did not lead to peace. In fact, the strife between the Humans, Elves, and Orcs have intensified even more. All the while, lurking in the shadows, a nefarious power plots its revenge.

When the Prophecy of the Apocalypse spread across the land, it became woven into the fabric of fate. Legend says only "Omega," an ancient relic of the Angels, has the power to alter fate and prevent the end of the world.

Join the epic saga! EMPOWER YOUR HEROES, BATTLE WITH ANGELS! Reclaim the glory of the League of Angels!

[Game Introduction]
The newest mobile game in award-winning League of Angels series is here! League of Angels: Paradise Land is the next epic fantasy RPG that will take you on a harrowing journey through the world of the Angels.

Visually, the game features beautiful 3D graphics, dynamic scenery, and exquisite character design created by senior art director on GTA5. On the gameplay side, a new dual-resource combat system and incorporation of multiple genres like MOBA and Roguelike has created a unique and innovative mobile RPG for the LoA universe.


[Game Features]

Superb Visual Presentation:
- Stunning combat effects
- Dynamic 3D scenery
- Exquisite character art and design

Engaging Strategy:
- Epic Battles: Recruit Heroes and strategically build your team to defeat the forces of evil
- Innovative Dual Resource combat system adds another layer of strategy

Multiple Progression Methods:
- Recruit Heroes, Augment and Ascend their power, learn and upgrade powerful Skills, and build your ultimate team
- Thousands of Hero Equipment to find; Upgrade, Refine, and even Awaken them to unlock their true potential
- Imbue your Heroes with new powers using the mystical Magistones
- Hero Blessing allows all your Heroes add to your strength

Wide Variety of Gameplay:
- Honor Trial: Dungeon-crawling game mode based on the Roguelike genre
- Labyrinth: Explore the darkest depths, find hidden treasures, and confront epic Bosses!
- Arena: Battle players around the world, use strategy to conquer your rivals
- Guilds: Create or join Guilds with hundreds of players, strive towards common goals


Visit the official website to start your saga: https://pl.gtarcade.com/
Follow us on Facebook for a chance to earn special rewards: https://www.facebook.com/LoAParadiseLand/
developerAddress: 12/F San Toi Bldg,137 - 139 Connaught Rd C,Sheung Wan,Hong Kong

title: League of Angels-Paradise Land

comments: Love this little game! I wish we had five life's, Three just gets me started. But overall, it's a great game. Getting like Candy Crush the higher the level the more impossible it gets to finish. Please don't make it so hard to win. I keep having to use coins to buy lives. Can never build up enough to amount to anything. Also you can give cash on the scratch off card. PLEASE !!!

Very hard and not as fun as the other games but  because you cannot even solved one level in a 3 lives. My friends do not want to play when I showed them how it is being played. I've noticed that the first part of level 3 is more fun now than before. But still the 2nd and 3rd level is very hard. I admire those who completed the whole cities. They must be geniuses in algorithms in solving the 9 moves in one level. The most amazing part of this game are the graphics.  Awesome really awesome.  Very well done. Still playing this game but also still cannot convince my friends to get out of CC and other games. Will keep on trying though.

This game is set up to STEAL a certain number of lives before you can win a level. Some levels, like Venice, level 79 may never be won. I have bought extra lives twice, extra moves twice, I REFUSE to make anymore purchases. If this was a truly user friendly game, it would BANK any extra moves, lighting, and other bonuses you've earned but did not use. But no, it throws them out. STEALS what you have earned. BANK it for me, I earned it, I should get to keep it. I'm done with this game.

I am glad for the staff at big fish they did a wonderful job getting me back play after all my levels where lost.. They found them all and it made me happy that i can play where i was.. I can not play to often sometimes and had taken me a long time but look forward to every new city i get to open a new and all the challenges i get to participate in.  Thank you all for this game

Fantastic game!  I love the graphics and interesting bits of trivia shared every time a landmark is built.  I also like the extra daily challenges and the special events that open up every so often.  Gummy Drop is challenging but can be played without needing to make any in-app purchases.  One con: the game starts you with three lives (lives replenish after 20 minutes), but in order to permanently increase your lives to five, you must pay $10.

Surprisingly fun! I was setting the ads for this game everywhere but thought they were really unappealing. Work on your ads a little to emphasize the fun prizes for completing levels, the enjoyable hunt for tour letters in old levels, the history of the buildings you save! So many great things happening in this game.

descriptionHTML:
JAM, CRUSH, & MATCH three or more candy like gummies and blast your way through thousands of 🎇 FUN levels in this FREE puzzle game. Solve puzzles and rebuild famous landmarks.

Download the game that over 40,000,000 people are already playing worldwide! CRUSH combos of sweet gummies alone or challenge your friends to see who can get the highest score! Matching candy like pieces is so exciting you won’t want to stop playing this 💕 addictive free match-3 puzzle game. LET’S GO GUMMY!

Blast Sweet Boosts
• Match jelly gummies to make special power ups & boosts
• Crush rows with the Plasma Strike
• Blast candy like pieces with the Bomb Boost
• Pop open daily treasure chests full of gems and resources
• Crush levels and get high scores to collect bonus rewards

Match-3 Excitement
• Juicy gummies squish & pop when you match them
• Puzzles with ⏰ timed and limited moves provide fun challenges
• Blast through unique levels & explore exotic locales around the world

Match-3 Puzzle Game Fun Goes 🌏 Global
• New puzzles and cities are added every month
• Free rewards when you solve limited time events
• Match your way around the world using travel vouchers to fly to any city, anytime
• Crush puzzles to rebuild famous cities
• Pop candy like gummies to build landmarks from Sydney to Tokyo, Paris to Dubai and more
• Blast your way through over 50 cities & collect stamps for your passport

More FREE puzzles to solve with Gummy Drop!
• Fun puzzles don’t stop, with over 10,000 levels to play!
• Sweet holiday & Christmas events like Santa’s Workshop provide collectible passport stamps
• Play timed events for infinite life boosts & other rewards

Match to Collect Resources
• Complete tasty gummy levels to gather resources
• Play though levels again to be able to rebuild the landmarks
• Match through side levels to help locals and score bonus resources

Gummy Drop! is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.

descriptionHTML:
When the zombies approach, you have to defend yourself! Don't want to blindly await death? Call up your school girls! Over 30 million players across the globe are waiting to play with you! The war has just begun...

【Storyline】
After a massive viral attack, the world has befallen to a disaster in which zombies spread all over it. The last human beings are stuck inside the ruins of a school, and you are their commander. Here, you can collect and train beautiful young girls with different talents to be your personal zombie killers. They’re ready to eliminate zombies outside the school for you.
A huge wave of zombies is coming and you’re the last hope of saving the earth and mankind! (ง •̀ω•́)ง

【Features】
• The crazy storyline of this game will suck you in
• Collect and train numerous Zgirls to be your zombie killers
• Upgrade your base to resist all kinds of raids from zombies and foes
• Manufacture ultimate equipment to support your forces even better
• Abundant quests and events help you quickly develop
• Play with friends or foes among players from all over the world
• Face and take down terrifying zombies. Go, Zgirls!


【Contact】
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WarGameZgirls/

comments: Alright, once you start the game, you will be bombarded with text, and difficult to read names if you are unfamiliar with the franchise, But you definitely get used to the UI and various names soon.   It is free to play, and unless you are aiming to be top 1% I personally don't think the cash shop is mandatory. You do get free stuffs in forms of daily chests and log in events, jut be patient if you don't want to spend money on it. You will get the stuffs eventually.    Story mode is fun, and often quite challenging, If you can't decide whether or not you want to play the game, just give it a try for few hours. Who knows, you might like it!

The worst thing happened in this game is players can use cheat/mod for annihilation. I low down from 5 star to 1 because of this issue which cannot be fixed in 3 weeks. There is no harsh punishment for cheating players who claim to the top to get reward. Even though I love this game so much, i am very disappointed with the response of developer of the game about this issue.

Pacing is a bit slow, and getting good artifacts is a gacha sink, but the core gameplay is presently the best tactical gaming on offer for mobile phones.  FFT is still the genre's high mark, but RotTK is a different breed, and best in class.

Was loving the game until I upgraded to Android 8.0 and it stopped working. I just click on it and nothing happens. Will rate higher after that is fixed. Edit: As of now it is fully working with Android 8.0
The game is very good, but since yesterday that I updated the game always pop up that my connection is unstable attempting to connect even I have 4G internet. Please fix it for this problem.

A good game but there hits a point where grinding is necessary to make further progress. Too many different currencies to earn. Otherwise great game and glad to see LoCC revived, as well opportunities for new stories.

descriptionHTML:
Romance of the Three Kingdoms: The Legend of CaoCao is now available on mobile platforms around the world! Come play the timeless SRPG classic!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
■ The strategic tour de force ""The Legend of Cao Cao,"" remastered for mobile.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- Join Cao Cao in his legendary quest to dominate the Three Kingdoms!
- Assemble a team of elite commanders to conquer your foes!
- Reenact the tales of other legendary characters in [Story] mode!


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
■ The KOEI [Romance of Three Kingdoms] that you know and love!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- Put your tactical talent to the test against AI and other players alike!
- Complex strategy, simple controls!
- Build the perfect fighting force for every challenge!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
■ Brand-new content to usher a retro favorite into the modern age!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- Jump into asynchronous PVP with [Annihilation]!
- Fight the pivotal battles of every Kingdom in the robust expanded [Story] mode!
- Cooperate with other players to build your empire!

■ Mobile application permission guides
The app requires certain permissions deliver a few key services.
[Key access permission]
Picture/Media/Save File: Save game/update files and attach screenshots for customer service.
[Turn off permission]
▶ Android Version 6.0 and above: Settings > Apps > App permissions > Choose specific permission > Turn permission On or Off
▶ Below Android Version 6.0: Upgrade your operating system to turn off permissions or delete app
※Some apps might not allow you to opt into permissions individually. In that case, permissions can be turned off using the method outlined above.

comments: Nice Game! At the start its easy, like many players said, but maybe they didnt stick through to further their games,I believe the easy start is needed to build for the later part of the games specially if you are a f2p player. Though being F2P isnt as bad here as it is on other games (speaking from experience). I like thier new updates now and specially the "sweep" requirement. Thanks Devs! my only hope is that please make planting/ crops a little easier on us common folks,it gets a little bit tiring to have to press from seed>plant repeat (depending on your available field). Anyway, besides this i do not regret playing the game, easy controls, f2p friendly, graphics is good, controls are good. Keep up the good work devs!looking forward to more updates
For the love of God let me grammar check your game...
Very nice and addictive game, i like it.  Would be nicer if pvp is already availble
Nice game. I just hope more free diamonds to be given during quests :)
I love the game but what happened to pk cus you guys are an different company

Downloaded the game just to see LoL heroes like Ahri and Sona on action only to found out most of them in preview screenshots doesn't exist in-game. But overall a fun game and f2p friendly.  Edit: upped my rating to 5 after 5 days playing, you guys deserve it. Keep up the good work. :)

comments: Addictive and engrossing game.  The bonus covers work well. The constant character tweaking and release rate makes the vs progression awards with wins is very good.  The favorites is a good way to let folks focus on building certain characters.  The transition points are still frustrating, especially when you get a run of bad luck with tokens.  Tokens might work better if they scaled instead. Biggest issue is progression awards in versus and the tough transitions in levels.

This is an awesome, addictive and hyper fun game. Brilliant idea and concept. In all the games I have played this is the first I have spent money on. VIP member. Have a couple suggestions for developer tho. Can you add abilities to swap covers with alliance members and maybe add as a bonus drop for playing, an extra free slot. Keep up the brilliant work. Truely love this game.

I have been playing this game for a few years now and love it! But a little suggestion... Because of the time I've spent playing it and the already difficult ability to get 4 and 5 star characters, I have nearly 3 million iso-8 that I literally cannot spend. Please add a way to convert iso-8 into hero points or command points!!! I'd like to get further in the game instead of literally stockpiling iso-8. This has all been done without spending a single dollar on the game too, btw

This is my go-to game. Day and night. It's fun, simple and sometime challenging. My only complaint is that i have like a million of Iso-8 and don't know what to do with them. My thought would be that if we don't need so much Iso-8, be sweet to give some to aliance member who needs it or so on. Great game. Don't know what I'd do without it!

Suitable for all age groups, Marvel Puzzle Quest is a great game for everyone. Progress with higher tier characters may be slow but yet significant. The wide variety of heroes and villians within the game allows for endless possibilities of the "best team". Highly addictive, I would recommend this perfect game to anyone and everyone.

Love that they are always adding new characters. Would like to see some different characters like Cable, Domino, Sabretooth, and Bishop just to name a few. Just because they don't have a movie... Would also like to see some new events, new animations, and less repetitiveness. Love the collection part and finally being able to use characters when you've finally built their powers enough. Love that it can be played for free. Love that feedback is read and the game is constantly evolving.Thanks.
description: Marvel Comics‚Äô fearless Super Heroes and evil Super Villains come to life in this Official Marvel match 3 role playing game! Create your own epic Dream Team using the strongest Super Heroes and the nastiest Super Villains in the Marvel Universe! Play Super Hero characters like Spider-Man, Captain America, Wolverine and the Hulk as you battle your way to victory through multi-level match-three puzzles. Thor, Iron Man, Deadpool and other comic and movie Super Heroes await your challenge!   FEATURES‚òÖ Snag the top rank in Tournaments, Alliances, and Season Play for new character rewards and other prizes! ‚òÖ Form alliances with your friends and use your collective power to fight other players in events and epic battles via chat‚òÖ Experience deep RPG leveling‚òÖ Challenge your team of Super Heroes in exciting Player vs. Player tournaments‚òÖ Build strategic alliances with your favorite heroes and villains‚òÖ Join a community of 8 million players worldwide‚òÖ New events, features and tournaments direct from the Marvel Universe‚òÖ Exclusively written by Marvel‚Äôs Frank Tieri (Iron Man, Wolverine, Weapon X) and Alex Irvine (Iron Man: The Rapture, Daredevil Noir)THE ORIGINAL MATCH THREE SUPER HERO GAME!Match tiles to annihilate your opponents, harnessing Hulk‚Äôs superpower strength or Professor X‚Äôs mind control to manipulate the game board! Match 3 gems to power up, damage and bring even the most powerful Marvel comics characters to their knees. Will you be able to rank among the top champions?PLAY WITH MARVEL‚ÄôS GREATEST HEROES AND VILLAINSRecruit your favorite Super Hero characters from the X-Men, Avengers, S.H.I.E.L.D., Guardians of the Galaxy and more to create the ultimate Marvel dream team! Whether you play Spider-Man alongside his arch-nemesis Venom, or play Captain Marvel alongside her Ms. Marvel successor, Kamala Khan, YOU assemble your very own epic team of Marvel Comics Super Heroes!Play Ms. Marvel and her infamous fists against your fiercest foes or launch Captain America‚Äôs shield to stun your opponents in the final contest. Marvel Puzzle Quest‚Äôs ever-growing list of Super Hero comics and movie characters is updated regularly with new Super Heroes including Magneto, Black Panther, Ant-Man, Daredevil and more!UPGRADE YOUR CHAMPIONS AND GAIN POWERFUL REWARDSHarness the power of Iso-8 to upgrade your Super Hero Dream Team and collect comics to unlock Marvel characters and new superpowers. App is available in English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Japanese, and Korean.Developed by Demiurge StudiosINSTALL MPQ TO UNLEASH YOUR INNER SUPER HERO AND BECOME PART OF THE MARVEL UNIVERSE!¬© 2017 MARVELGAME SOFTWARE ¬© 2017 D3 Go!
descriptionHTML:
Marvel Comics’ fearless Super Heroes and evil Super Villains come to life in this Official Marvel match 3 role playing game! Create your own epic Dream Team using the strongest Super Heroes and the nastiest Super Villains in the Marvel Universe! Play Super Hero characters like Spider-Man, Captain America, Wolverine and the Hulk as you battle your way to victory through multi-level match-three puzzles. Thor, Iron Man, Deadpool and other comic and movie Super Heroes await your challenge!

FEATURES
★ Snag the top rank in Tournaments, Alliances, and Season Play for new character rewards and other prizes!
★ Form alliances with your friends and use your collective power to fight other players in events and epic battles via chat
★ Experience deep RPG leveling
★ Challenge your team of Super Heroes in exciting Player vs. Player tournaments
★ Build strategic alliances with your favorite heroes and villains
★ Join a community of 8 million players worldwide
★ New events, features and tournaments direct from the Marvel Universe
★ Exclusively written by Marvel’s Frank Tieri (Iron Man, Wolverine, Weapon X) and Alex Irvine (Iron Man: The Rapture, Daredevil Noir)

THE ORIGINAL MATCH THREE SUPER HERO GAME!
Match tiles to annihilate your opponents, harnessing Hulk’s superpower strength or Professor X’s mind control to manipulate the game board! Match 3 gems to power up, damage and bring even the most powerful Marvel comics characters to their knees. Will you be able to rank among the top champions?

PLAY WITH MARVEL’S GREATEST HEROES AND VILLAINS
Recruit your favorite Super Hero characters from the X-Men, Avengers, S.H.I.E.L.D., Guardians of the Galaxy and more to create the ultimate Marvel dream team! Whether you play Spider-Man alongside his arch-nemesis Venom, or play Captain Marvel alongside her Ms. Marvel successor, Kamala Khan, YOU assemble your very own epic team of Marvel Comics Super Heroes!

Play Ms. Marvel and her infamous fists against your fiercest foes or launch Captain America’s shield to stun your opponents in the final contest. Marvel Puzzle Quest’s ever-growing list of Super Hero comics and movie characters is updated regularly with new Super Heroes including Magneto, Black Panther, Ant-Man, Daredevil and more!

UPGRADE YOUR CHAMPIONS AND GAIN POWERFUL REWARDS
Harness the power of Iso-8 to upgrade your Super Hero Dream Team and collect comics to unlock Marvel characters and new superpowers.

App is available in English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Japanese, and Korean.

Developed by Demiurge Studios

INSTALL MPQ TO UNLEASH YOUR INNER SUPER HERO AND BECOME PART OF THE MARVEL UNIVERSE!

© 2017 MARVEL
GAME SOFTWARE © 2017 D3 Go!

comments: This is just amazing! Once you get started it gets a little tough, but you can have other people help you if your stuck. I love the easy gameplay and the graphics, The only problem I have with it is how hard I is to get ninja pearls without money, I'm young and dont have a credit card or job yet so I miss quite a few opportunities. I highly recommend to any Naruto fans.

This game is very great and can be addicting. The only problem u have is that when ever I try to play a mission it always says there is a communication error. I would really like to keep playing the game, so if there is anything you could do about it- that would be great.

your servers are bad.. trying to hunt Chino but 2 times already when we finish the last map and i see the yellow card of the last boss, then i get connection lost and don't get a thing in the end.. it is really frustrating to play for 15 minutes, see your goal fulfilled but then.. nooooo, you don't get the cards in the end

I love the game, but during multi-player, especially in impact missions, let us continue even if player 1 gives up. It's extremely annoying when you play to the boss, and their hp is very low,  and player 1 leaves and all that time was for nothing. Let player 2 and 3 continue, even if player 1 and 3 or 1 and 2 quit, let that last player control the other two. That's the only improvement I can think of for the next update.

I'm only putting it as one star in hopes the devs see this, but please find a better way to recover accounts. I've been a fan of this game for years and when I logged in I was logged out, I have no idea what my transfer info is because I've only had to do that once. I don't want to just start over, please find a better way for people to get their accounts back once your update logs them out.
It's not the best game but because I am a fan of naruto my interest in this game might be different than others would think. Overall its a decent mobile game but it could use some more improvements.

descriptionHTML:
NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja Blazing – Join the battle with your favorite NARUTO characters, fighting in Shinobi Formation Battles across the story of the renowned anime!

Fight hordes of enemies and complete missions using the all-new Shinobi Formation Battle system: a strategic RPG fighting system that unleashes exhilarating combination attacks with your allies. Master team field skills, discover new ninjutsu and become the next Hokage in the first-ever Ultimate Ninja mobile game!

NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja Blazing Features:

Battle Enemies with Your Ninja Dream Team!
• Control over 100 NARUTO heroes, each with their own unique attacks and tactics
• Fight enemies using ninjutsu, powerful special techniques and combination attacks
• Unleash ninjutsu abilities for powerful offensive strikes, defensive abilities that can stop enemy movement, and more

Mission Mode Based On the Original Anime Storyline!
• Mission Mode allows you to relive the experience of the NARUTO story
• Battle through stories from the original series

Ninja Skills and Powerful Attacks!
• Fighting skills include close-ranged and combination attacks for massive damage
• Ninja Field Skills can turn the tide of battle in your favor
• Fighting closely with your team allows for great opportunity, but also great risk

Fight Ninjas from Around the World in Online Multiplayer Games!
• Battle against other ninjas in multiplayer mode
• Join together and take on missions with up to 3 other ninjas

comments: Overall great game as far as playing is concerned. Major thing that could use work is matchmaking. Currently an 89 overall getting matched against 98-105 overall players. No chance to win and may discourage some people from playing the game. The gameplay is awesome and I have lots of fun, 100% worth your time if you avoid Head-to-head or tournaments (unless you have money or don't mind being poorly matched).

This is my full honest review. Madden Mobile is back!! I'll admit before it was not fun and I complained that you need to pay to win but EA really did good when I came back to play. The game is fun and is somewhat easy to get 100 overall players and now they are bringing back Draft Champs and I have seen early drafts and it looks great. The promos are great. I would like to say great job EA on bringing this game back and making it fun. I always want to play everyday and build my Ultimate Team

I have played this game for 3 seasons now.  I can't even begin to say all that is wrong, but one of the things that stands out most to me, is that your players stats mean nothing.  You spend a lot of time and effort completing events and grinding, and improve your team only to find out that when you play a team way below your level, it seems that that teams players are much faster and tend to play way above their ability.  this game seems to have the liberal bug that everyone is equal.  I am done with this game, don't get caught up with it, it's not worth the waste of your time

Thanks alot EA for this new head to head style. Great to know that all the grinding and work put in is only allowing those who have a 100 overall or better reap the rewards. Everytime playing one of these individuals they have a counter for every single play. This really turns me off to the game.

For the person hoping to find Madden 18, this is the closest thing you are gonna get. Yes, it doesn't have practice mode or my player mode, but it DOES have a incredible roster of players that you bargain for. The graphics are pretty good for a game on a smartphone.  Overall, this game is a MUST HAVE for NFL fans. 10 outta 10.

You know I really like all of the Live Events but when I get these old collectible cards that aren't worth anything I have to cut them one by one. It takes way too long and I've got over a hundred. I would suggest having a way to group delete or in Madden terms "cut" the old dead weight.

comments: Game wasn't all bad.....until you had to deal with customer support,  they could care less about the player. It was glitchy at times, report it, they'd just say they had no problems on their end...to bad. Had a few issues where customer support just blew us off.....sad to because could've been great game

Season 1 is the only enjoyable time to play for free to play players, having enhanced legendaries gairo becomes the most important aspect of later seasons 2, 3 etc.. and only by spending money do your chances of getting good cards rises, if not for how the card draws work this would be one very interesting game. Big spenders make the game unbalanced and unfair for any other players.

Love this game and have it on 2 of my other devices! But I try to play it here on my tablet and it loads, then right before it throws me in the game it force closes! :( sad and frustrating. I would love to see this fixed. Overall a great game though!

The game is great in itself, it's functional and fun. The issue is the game only matters until the schemes come to light and the backstabbing starts. This kind of game always suffers from the pay to play platform, it's capable of being played for free but the wallet warriors take things to a point where it's not fun for anyone else, and most of the time you can't actually play the game the way it's meant to be played.

Very good strategy game, tutorial helps you get started and provides you with resources at the beginning. Controls are occasionally confusing.  The game is rather complicated and I found it difficult to compete with long-term players although they were willing to help.
I will write a new review in a day or two - starting on a new server now, the last was without good cards. I love this game but, need a fighting chance ;  )
description: Immortal Conquest is a true tactical war strategy game created for the strategic mind.Devise masterful strategies to expand through over 2 MILLION pieces of land on a vast map shared by all players. Use your intellect to research the strongest combinations of over 300 MYTHOLOGICAL HEROES to lead your troops, each with their own unique characteristics and abilities. Plan for a 3 MONTH CAMPAIGN as you navigate the complexities of not only managing an army, but also navigating the diplomatic pitfalls of the 9 regions and the alliances that seek to control them.Beyond forging alliances, conquering cities, and building armies, every player competes for 1 ULTIMATE GOAL: to capture the center of the world, Delphi. It‚Äôs not about randomly killing each other, it‚Äôs about being part of something bigger and more meaningful. Like in a game of chess, you must outsmart and out-manoeuvre your opponents to secure victory. KEY FEATURES:- SUMMON mythological deities and heroes from Greek, Celtic, Egyptian and Norse mythology- RESEARCH optimal troop combinations: 300+ Heroes, 1000+ Skills, and countless possibilities- EXPAND your territory across a vast map consisting of over 2 million pieces of land- JOIN massive 300 VS 300 PvP alliance battles, the outcomes of which will make or break victory- STRATEGIZE and choose whether to use diplomacy or military might to realize your ambitionsWelcome to a new era, where smart is the new cool. Play Immortal Conquest, a game for the mind and heart, and achieve ultimate glory through world domination. ‚ÄúStrategy without tactics is the slowest route to victory. Tactics without strategy is the noise before defeat.‚Äù ‚ÄìSun Tzu, Art of War5/5 ‚ÄúThe game mechanics reflect how real war starts. Unlike in other games, resources are limited and expansion will create conflict. Military tactics, politics, diplomacy, you need to get everything in place to win the game. ‚Äù5/5 ‚ÄúIt's wonderful to find a game for my iPhone that requires a lot of strategy. You really have to plan things out ahead of time to achieve them. I haven't spent a dime on this game either. It's not one that you have to put money into it to be competitive. ‚Äù5/5 ‚ÄúThus far the game is solid, while showing face to the people and not the spenders. Strategy is evolving into a deeply competitive play. Even at the ground level if things. Worth the time to trial it out. This coming from a big spending type of player.‚ÄùKEEP IN TOUCHSupport : tap ‚ÄúHelp‚Äù in-game to contact us Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/ImmortalConquestGameForum : http://forum.immortalconquest.com/forum.php
descriptionHTML:
Immortal Conquest is a true tactical war strategy game created for the strategic mind.

Devise masterful strategies to expand through over 2 MILLION pieces of land on a vast map shared by all players. Use your intellect to research the strongest combinations of over 300 MYTHOLOGICAL HEROES to lead your troops, each with their own unique characteristics and abilities. Plan for a 3 MONTH CAMPAIGN as you navigate the complexities of not only managing an army, but also navigating the diplomatic pitfalls of the 9 regions and the alliances that seek to control them.

Beyond forging alliances, conquering cities, and building armies, every player competes for 1 ULTIMATE GOAL: to capture the center of the world, Delphi. It’s not about randomly killing each other, it’s about being part of something bigger and more meaningful. Like in a game of chess, you must outsmart and out-manoeuvre your opponents to secure victory.

KEY FEATURES:
- SUMMON mythological deities and heroes from Greek, Celtic, Egyptian and Norse mythology
- RESEARCH optimal troop combinations: 300+ Heroes, 1000+ Skills, and countless possibilities
- EXPAND your territory across a vast map consisting of over 2 million pieces of land
- JOIN massive 300 VS 300 PvP alliance battles, the outcomes of which will make or break victory
- STRATEGIZE and choose whether to use diplomacy or military might to realize your ambitions

Welcome to a new era, where smart is the new cool. Play Immortal Conquest, a game for the mind and heart, and achieve ultimate glory through world domination.

“Strategy without tactics is the slowest route to victory. Tactics without strategy is the noise before defeat.” –Sun Tzu, Art of War

5/5 “The game mechanics reflect how real war starts. Unlike in other games, resources are limited and expansion will create conflict. Military tactics, politics, diplomacy, you need to get everything in place to win the game. ”

5/5 “It's wonderful to find a game for my iPhone that requires a lot of strategy. You really have to plan things out ahead of time to achieve them. I haven't spent a dime on this game either. It's not one that you have to put money into it to be competitive. ”

5/5 “Thus far the game is solid, while showing face to the people and not the spenders. Strategy is evolving into a deeply competitive play. Even at the ground level if things. Worth the time to trial it out. This coming from a big spending type of player.”

KEEP IN TOUCH
Support : tap “Help” in-game to contact us
Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/ImmortalConquestGame
Forum : http://forum.immortalconquest.com/forum.php

I cant play because the game crashes it takes me out of the game fix that and i will give it all stars it also gives me errors in the game itself for examples stamina error and free draw error I stopped playing the game because it kicks me out to much. This game crashes for android any android phone I don't understand.

The game is good, only the server. If you guys want people continue play your game. Do something about this. I hopefully, this problem fix as soon as possible!.

The game has gotten worse tried to play after creating a new character and the game crashed on me, seriously gamevil you are slipping and it's a shame

comments: I love this game up until it asked me for a loan for one of the characters for 250 gems that i purchased. I contact Tech support and nothing is being done. After this last update I lost slot. It started off awesome but once I started investing money in the game it's like it just took my money by taking the gifts and coins.  Such a waste of time and money when no corrections are made.  Trying to give the developer a chance to redeem themselves from this error.

I like the idea of changing prices and finding new recipes. I want the barista to automatically start the machines if there isn't one already there. i want to be able to hire another barista. I want to put my menu on the other wall. I want smaller windows. There's basically a lot of things i feel limited on and i still haven't figured out if i can change the color on wallpaper or not.

I watched the 4 adverts and got a no diamonds for the doing so. I also watched the the add to pick a bonus prize, never got a that either. I used to play this game a lot and I've noticed the prices of everything have went up and including the spices. You no longer have the option to buy the cheaper furniture forcing you to spend more so customers come in to the Cafe. Very greedy and game makers. Sort these issues and give me the diamonds I'm owed or take away the ads.

I'm used to like this game very much, addicting and lovely although it is so p2w. After certain update my game will start to reverse progress itself when one message pop out and state "profile change, please restart". Recently this problem occur very frequent and its so unbearable and irritating when what u done it just become undone, ALWAYS.  Im so fed up with this and quit for few days, wish developer can fix or lessen this issues or i will just uninstall it one day, thanks for reading.

In the world of cafe games this one is a gem that stands out like a diamond in the rough. Fun and easy to play, it's set at a relaxing pace with you learning new recipes and chatting with your customers. Who are all really interesting people with unique storylines....I think one of them is trying to steal the Mona Lisa,lol.

Fix the controls! Atleast have an option to enable and disable the editing of the layout or location of the items in-game. Such a pain that God-forbid you touched an item for a half a second too long it will prompt you to move, delete or put that item in storage.

descriptionHTML:
My Cafe is an addictive bakery & restaurant story game where you set off to help chef Ann open a classy cafe and serve her guests delicious drinks and baked goods.

The first episodes of your coffee shop adventure begins as you set off to a quiet town and open your own classy cafe with your friend Ann! Serve coffee, cook bakery goods and immerse yourself in an addictive kitchen & restaurant simulator that’s brimming with exciting tales and stories.

Download My Cafe: Recipes & Stories and tell your cooking story!

Exciting features in this restaurant simulator lets you:
★ Build and scramble a diner, pizza bakery, or restaurant – hire staff, buy furniture, improve the kitchen and set prices on the menu.
★ Design your coffee shop with tons of glamorous decorative items – After all, comfort is in the details! Be the brightest café on the street.
★ Discover baking and cooking, including special food and drinks like the Sweet Tales Latte, the Mojito Cupcake, and more. Feel the cooking fever in our eating game!
★ Develop your own business strategy and management take big risks or go for slow to ensure you make a profit and thrive in Cafeland game.
★ Bring your restaurant to life with impactful stories and colorful customers for kids and adults. Gossip with regulars and choose your own responses to influence the direction of the story, and make new friends in your neighborhood. Each story is unique in My Cafe: Recipes & Stories!

Features:

My Restaurant, My Cafe Story
• Story mode with unique characters and meaningful relationships. Learn the stories of your regulars, influence their gossip life, make new friends and experience your own Kitchen Craze restaurant adventure in this nice life simulator.

Cafe Treats & Bakery Sweets
• Coffee mania, fast food, dinners, desserts and hot drinks for cafe fans of pizza games from crazy kitchen!
• Bakery treats and restaurant eats!
• Special baking and cooking recipes like the Sweet Tales Latte, the Mojito Cupcake!

Restaurant Mania & Cafe Simulator
• Design your own coffee shop with over 900 decorative items
• Make a business paradise at your cafe by taking big risks or going slow and steady.
• Manage restaurant staff, hire, train and fire your employees in our making food game

Customized Cafe & Bakery Story - Gossip & Intrigue Abound
• Coffee shop gossip goes a long way! Investigate the town’s story, see how characters fall in love, make their choices and discover secrets the whole cartoon city wants to know!

Play with friends
Go social – see how your Facebook friends are running their own coffee shops and townships in your favorite game!

My Cafe: Recipes & Stories is the restaurant story of a lifetime inside a casual game! Gossip with cafe guests and meet new friends in a story mode so deliciously addictive for girls, you’ll never want to put it down! Become a happy world chef and build your bakery, sushi cafe, diner or restaurant with cooking dash to make the best dishes and drinks in a story game that lets you play your way, choose your story and start a true!

However, some in-game items can be purchased for real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

My Cafe: Recipes & Stories is FREE to download and play with no obligations to pay.

Note:
An internet connection is required to play our cooking game

SUPPORT
Chef, are you having a problem with the game? Please contact us by going to the game Settings > FAQ or visit https://goo.gl/Bw6QVb.
Our support service: http://melesta.freshdesk.com/support/tickets/new

Play the best episode of games with your friends, including friends from Facebook, and bring your exciting restaurant story to life in the exciting new business simulator My Cafe: Recipes & Stories. Join in the fun!

Time management games fans from all over the world have already started their restaurant story.

How to develop your coffee shop and choose your own story:
Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/MyCafeGame
developerAddress: 105, Agion Omologiton Avenue, 1080 Nicosia, Cyprus

Completing both stories allows players to reach level 29 and unlock new content.
FOR VIPs:

summary: Cooking, Design & Cafe Management - all with a fun story! Own a Restaurant ‚òï‚òï
title: My Cafe: Recipes & Stories - World Cooking Game

descriptionHTML:
*** Hungry Shark World Selected in Google Play’s Best Games of 2016 collection ***
The Sharks are back in the bigger and badder sequel to Hungry Shark Evolution!
Control a shark in a feeding frenzy and eat your way through many oceans feasting on everything from bite-size fish and birds to tasty whales and unwitting humans!
***This game is only compatible with devices running on Android 4.2 or above***

MORE THAN 20 SHARK SPECIES
Choose from a range of sharks in 7 different size tiers, including the most iconic ocean predator: the Great White!

HUGE OPEN WORLDS
Explore the lush Pacific Islands, frozen Arctic Ocean, exotic Arabian Sea, and now the South China Sea, a vibrant urban destination full of fresh, unwary victims!

FEAST FOR YOUR EYES
Experience the feeding frenzy in stunning console quality 3D graphics that will blow everything else out of the water!

SURVIVAL OF THE HUNGRIEST
It’s eat or be eaten in waters packed with 100s of delicious and dangerous creatures… Whales, submarines and wandering locals BEWARE!

SMASHING SHARK SWAG
Level up your shark and equip jawsome gadgets to bite harder, swim faster and grow even hungrier! No shark is complete without headphones, umbrella and a freakin' jetpack!

MANIC MISSIONS & BADASS BOSSES
Take on more than 20 different types of mission including high score challenges, prey hunts and epic boss fights!

HELPFUL PREDATORY PETS
Baby sharks, whales, an octopus, and even a bald eagle are happy to help with special abilities to increase health, score and more!

SUPERSIZED MEAL DEAL
Unleash your shark's predator potential: SuperSize mode, rushes, explosion, hypnosis and more!

INTUITIVE TILT CONTROLS
Back by popular demand, now you can control your shark simply by tilting your phone!

Google Play Leaderboards and Achievements enabled.
Use Facebook to synchronise your progress across your GP devices.
Hungry Shark World is regularly updated with new features, content and challenges to keep you coming back for more!
This app contains In-App Purchases which allow you to buy Gems and Gold currency which can be spent on upgrades and accessories. Gems and Gold can also be collected in game without requiring purchases.
This game contains advertising. Advertising is disabled if you make any purchase.

Like the game on Facebook for the latest news: www.facebook.com/HungryShark
Follow us on Twitter @Hungry_Shark
Or Youtube: http://youtube.com/FutureGamesOfLondon
And join our community!

Twitter http://twitter.com/ubisoftmobile
Youtube http://youtube.com/user/Ubisoft

comments: Not a bad game but it's typical like some other games. It starts off with the levels being super easy, letting you build your confidence to get you thinking you're really good.  Now I understand the higher the levels the more difficulty there is but not to the point where they make it almost impossible trying to get you to buy more chances. Another words they're trying to get you to pay to win and advance not necessarily on skill level. Very sneaky. Uninstalling. It's fun for a while but overall I do not recommend.

Love this game, but it freezes up. I go to try and reinstall it after a few days but it won't let me reinstall the game. Just stays at the same  level last completed. Still having the problem of when having to reinstall I lose all my lives and charms. Love the game but hate ,owing all my lives and charms
I love this game but damn, why does the videos seem to always freeze up. I mean, don't get me wrong, it's a good game and all, so why don't you guys just fix the glitches. Thank youü§î

The update took me from level 400 back to level 1 very upset be first I wasn't getting my daily play rewards so I figured like everything else it may need to update and the update blow my whole progress. I'm so pissed is there a way to fix this?

I actually enjoyed the game and would give it four or five stars except 200 coins and multiple items were taking away simply because I got logged out if Facebook. Also several levels were lost.... This I understand, glitches happen. What I don't understand and don't accept is the lack of response from the developer. I've sent several emails and have yet to get a non automated response.
I installed the game about 3 times and gave up. Can't connect with Facebook and when playing it suddenly stop and say it's not responding.

comments: Absolutely sublime! This game is so awesome it's exactly what I want in a dragon game! Although there are microtransactions, you can absolutely play this game without spending a cent to progress! I have never ever payed real money to purchase gold, food and all other resources and I've played this game for almost two years The two tips are a little bit of patience and to keep on breeding. Even if you've already bred a certain pair of dragons, selling unwanted eggs is the best and quickest way to make gold

Once you get to level 100, breeding a dragon is almost impossible to nil. Very frustrating. My roommate and I started this game the same time. I am level 115 and she is on 83. We will breed the same dragons at the same time, she will succeed 85% of the time on the first try, it will take me over 10 times if I even get it, this started after level 100. Good luck long term players.

The events are annoying. I have reached the max on collecting eggs. I just gather then from doing tasks. Does that mean I can't participate anymore and am just stuck. I don't understand. Why would you limit the gathering of items?

Have been playing this game for a couple of years now and I love it! Sometimes it's frustrating - especially when you'd need to buy something to be able to get all the prizes during events - but it just makes it more challenging.  VERY happy with the customer support. I had an issue with a gift not being added to my totals, so I emailed them and they fixed it without issue.

The game is definitely addicting. But when I went into the Egg-straordinary Egg hunt island and tapped on a activty, it said their was a wonky spell and it completely stopped the whole game. I've tried different things different times, and it still won't work. I have played this in the past and the same exact thing happened, but with something different.

This game is AWSOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOme. I had 1023 gems saved up and then it glitched and now I only have 34. I love this game so much! Please help me get my 984 gems back! I don't want to rate it lower than 5 stars, but this has happened twice now...üòü

comments: Really enjoy playing this game so addictive. I currently play it on a samsung galaxy phone and I'm over 400 levels played. I am  going to be changing phones over to iphone and wondered if I could download game and carry on where I left off, or would I have to start all over again? Hope not.

I was a devoted player to Blast solitaire but this game has it beat. I love the challenge games as well as the journey to getting more gardens. Wish there were ways to get free wildcards? I hate paying that six grand for a help card. But I am addicted and I highly recommend it!

Love the game but I think the bonus levels to unlock gold crops should be heaps cheaper to play. Some of them are hard and you run out of money to keep trying them as they cost as much as a normal level to play.

It looks good and the gameplay is fun. Unfortunately that fun only lasts so long before the game devolves into micro transaction hell. Each round gets so expensive that I can only play one or two unless I were to buy coin packs. These guys should be ashamed.

Really fun game but costs too many credits to play and the extra five cards and wild are over priced considering the cost of credits per game round. Could be better if these issues get resolved I would edit my review to five stars all around.
It is a fun game. BUT, the levels cost so many coins that it's very slow. Unless you plan to pay real money or can win every level 1st try, expect to play maybe 1 game an hour.

comments: Awesome game.  Biggest downside I don't like is, unlike similar games, once the small packs are bought you are only offered the largest ($50/$100). I'd honestly like to see all packs back or at least if you're going to tier up buying options, at least offer a $25 as lowest.

Once you loose the shield, you will get farmed by higher level players, forcing you to use whatever resources you have left over to repair. Once you finished repair, you not surprisingly get attacked again. This results you in being frustrated and uninstalling or you foolishly spend your hard earned cash for resources that you will soon enough loose from being attacked.

Why do you need a commander to be sent to gather resources? This is absurd! I need troops to gather but then again I want my commanders to attack renegades and stuff! Please make gathering without th e need to send a commander with troops!!

Don't waste your time unless you are going to spend large amounts of money. Free to play players get attacked daily by credit card players and you dont get a chance to progress. Good idea for a game but sadly very imbalanced.

Overall an excellent game IF you have an alliance to back you up.  Otherwise you are a sitting duck. I recommend this game anytime to anyone because you do a lot in half an hour.   Only option I request is warlords events diring the weekend.  Poly and Thor are critcal resources and there never seems to be enough unless you pay for it.

Again the only way to move forward is to pay large amounts of money.!!! every rss is so scarce to retrieve and trying to obtain VIP is I don't even know how without paying money.... the chat is just plain messed up also...

comments: Extremely addictive! First day I played I overshot my bus stop by 5 minutes because I forgot to look up.  There is always something to do in the game somewhere - and the micro transaction bit doesn't feel forced, and you can easily progress without it.  It kept me occupied for days - unfortunately I had to delete it because I got too caught up.  So if you're looking for a game to grab your attention and keep you entertained on long commutes and the like, this is great for that

Fun little game, but I would love for food, and water, to be a little bit faster. Also maybe rise up the rush chances. I do have 1 suggestion, maybe when the people off to the Waste Lands, they can find some rare stuff, like gems or maybe clothes/weapons. This game is really fun, even though I've just started it, keep up the great work! üëçüèΩ

I figured my old ass phone wouldnt run this game when first announced, just confirming for folks it sure doesnt. I thought there might be a chance it would cos my phone is rooted and I have full control over how my ram is utilized. Thank bob for android emulators on desktop, can't wait to play :)

Look, I can kind of understand dwellers not dropping their assignments to fight raiders, but can we have the ability to assign fighters to the raiders themselves. It's a massive and unnecessary pain to constantly remind my few armed dwellers to actually fight the raiders instead of just looking cute in the room they just left. Weapons are scarce in this game, and raiders move too often to play pass the gun. It would also be nice if there was a pause feature, but that would reduce the butler-bot purchases.

Fantastic! A resource management sim that is incredibly fresh and charming thanks to the richness of the Fallout franchise. Keeps you coming back for hours. From the quirkiness of the dwellers to the depth of the side quest system, this game is deserving of your time. Finally, the game is totally playable without paying. Still, throw the devs a few bucks! You'll sink hours into this title.

Absolutely love this game. If you're a die hard fallout fan, or even someone new to the series this is the perfect game for you. You'll get a sense of nostalgia pulling your first legendary dweller, or a sigh of relief when you obtain that last part for the weapon you've been looking to craft. Fallout Shelter is the perfect mobile game for any fan of the series. The game is slow and hard in the beginning but when you get on your feet you'll never want to put it down. If you're on the edge about downloading it please do, it's worth all the time and space!

descriptionHTML:
** Google Play Best of 2015 **
Mobile Game of the Year - 2016 DICE Awards
Winner 2015 Golden Joystick Best Handheld/Mobile Game

"Might just be the best free-to-play game out there" - GamesBeat
"Probably the best game of E3 2015” – Gizmodo
"Fallout Shelter is simple to play and addictive as hell." - GameZone

BUILD THE PERFECT VAULT
Create a brighter future…underground! Select from a variety of modern-day rooms to turn an excavation beneath 2,000 feet of bedrock into the very picture of Vault Life.

OVERSEE A THRIVING COMMUNITY
Get to know your Dwellers and lead them to happiness. Find their ideal jobs and watch them flourish. Provide them with outfits, weapons, and training to improve their abilities.

CUSTOMIZE
Turn worthless junk into useful items with Crafting! Customize the look of any dweller in the Barbershop.

PROSPER
A well-run Vault requires a variety of Dwellers with a mix of skills. Build a Radio Room to attract new Dwellers. Or, take an active role in their personal lives; play matchmaker and watch the sparks fly!

EXPLORE THE WASTELAND
Send Dwellers above ground to explore the blasted surface left behind and seek adventure, handy survival loot, or unspeakable death. Find new armor and weapons, gain experience, and earn Caps. But don’t let them die!

PROTECT YOUR VAULT
From time to time, idyllic Vault life may be disrupted by the dangers of post-nuclear life. Prepare your Dwellers to protect against threats from the outside…and within.

Vault-Tec has provided the tools, but the rest is up to you. What are you waiting for? Get started building your Vault today for FREE.

1370 Piccard Drive, Suite 120
Rockville, MD 28050

comments: Complete fraud. There is simply no Heroes gameplay in there, if you are in for the turn based tactical combat of the classic - it's not there. If you are bored with your menial office job and want another boring office job on your phone - knock yourself out. Or gambling, this offer plenty of gambling too if you are into that kind of thing.

Do not buy Anything!!!  Last reset lost so much stuff.  Devs play favorites. Compensate Favorite players with top troops.  No compensation for others.  Have photos to prove.  4th time still no compensation
All around fun game. Unlike most of this genre I haven't had boot problems. Great way to kill time when you're bored.
Does not handle spotty internet connectivity well. Literally cannot fight the tutorial mobs because it constantly reatarts itself

I don't understand why games like this always advertise themselves as something other than what they are. I was very excited because it looked  like a Heroes of Might and Magic mobile reboot but it's just another boring kingdom building game. So disappointing. I wish these game companies would actually create the games they're always pretending to be.
Awesome game. Easy and addictive.. you can grow easily and get strong without spending tons of cash and you can spend a little and it goes very far..

comments: Cursor controls dont always respond. Rewards are not based on ingame  rankings but on a separate list which is suppose to match ingame ranking but is not updated regularly, so if ur first and get a 6th place reward. Now you know why. Servers open about twice a week. Merge happens about every 2 weeks. Unless you plan on spending minimum 100$ US. Expect to be at the bottom of the barrel.

Game is a rip off and there only worried about getting your money while major bugs and issues are all over. You try to inform them about these issues and noticed from several other players with same issues but they seem to not care or attempt to get back to you. If you search Facebook page you will see there replies to various players are just a bunch of emojis showing that they are just a bunch of immature people. Definitely do your research on this game before downloading. I don't want anyone else making the same mistake I made with this game.

WHY DON'T YOU PUT PARTIAL NUDITY BEFORE YOU GO AND LITERALLY MAKE ME DOWNLOAD IT IDIOTS!  Oh LOOK A FEW SECONDS INTO THE GAME YOUR KICKIN OFF WITH FULL NUDITY PEOPLE FULL NUDITY WHAT A WASTE OF MY SPACE. Beep* uninstall NEVER INSTALLING FROM YOU IDIOTS AGAIN You STUPID RIPOFF OF EA Games. I MEAN WHO NAMES THEIR COMPANY GAME EA. Worst game EVER

Well if you like games that play them selves then this game is for you. 2 stars are for graphics and storytelling in game. I would rather play old Diablo 1 than this game, you have almost no control in game, everything is auto! Auto walk, auto battle, auto sell, auto quest, auto feed pet. The only thing that breaks auto-play is messaging other players and talking to npc. Just make the game a movie its more than halfway there.

Good game. can't say ive experienced the problems other players have pointed out thus far. It is crowded with lots of players but you're free to roam at your own pace. Automation in an MMO is silly but I don't mind. I also was kind of expecting Dark Souls not WoW as the aesthetic and tone. I suppose my advise would be just add more classes, more stuff to do, and encourage actual interaction with environment and players. But not a bad game all in all

Not good if you want to play this game, there's always people trying to kill you if you interact with players with red on their name. Im trying to level up my character and some random people keep killing my character, you can't have a personal space while you trying to level up, I'm warning you, don't be decieved by the flashy trailer they'll do any for your wallet
