comments: Like many others. I loved this game until the update. In fact every chance I got I was on it. Now it won't even load! Very upsetting indeed. Why change something that wasn't broken!! üò°  UPDATE...since the second update the game is back and I LOVE it. Thank you so much for sorting it out. I genuinely love this game!!

So frustrating to play since the update. Game constantly crashes, cannot play for longer than a few minutes before it crashes, can't go into any other hospitals because it crashes, can't watch videos because it crashes.....*STILL crashing, even after new update. I'm now getting a message on update screen 'this app may not be optimised for your device' - this app worked perfectly fine before update, why now is the app not optimised??

This is A cute game to play doctor and all.  I just wish earning coins did not take so long, because to add on a clinic or expansion, it takes up all your money.  Also to purchase item for the hospital, the cost of each item goes up after you purchase one item. Like the waiting room chairs starts at 40 coins after a few chairs it is now at 70 coins per chair. Like how unfair is that?  Like is their a limit to how high each item gets?

The problem is the friends system requires you connect via Facebook. For people that don't want to, or don't have Facebook, you're screwed. Please implement a way to add friends inside the game rather than through Facebook harassment.

The game has the potential to be very entertaining however the constant crashes and app failure is very disheartening. Definite work needed to improve these issues, now its saying the app may not be optimized for the device. Why wouldn't it say that before downloading? Try again!
Very laggy, took up alot of space on my phone. Wouldn't let me drag anything from one place to another. Very annoying. Don't reccomend
description: World‚Äôs healthiest game!Cure your way through the quirkiest and funniest diseases in My Hospital - the ultimate simulation game where you design, manage and maintain your very own medical centre! Create elixirs, farm and harvest your own medical plants and produce cures for hundreds of patients that need your help. It‚Äôs a world where Panacea rules and every treatment is available at your fingertips! ‚óâ BUILD YOUR HOSPITALConstruct and manage your own hospital. Build doctor‚Äôs offices, diagnostic rooms, the treatment centre and laboratories. Expand and upgrade your hospital and share it with friends! ‚óâ CREATE UNIQUE CURESFarm and harvest plants with healing properties, produce dozens of elixirs, and blend syrups to treat more than 80 funny diseases. Whether it‚Äôs a chilli throat condition, frozen hands or slimey lungs, you‚Äôll be sure to find the cure! Unlock new remedies, treatment rooms and new conditions with every level and complete fun challenges!‚óâ DECORATE YOUR HOSPITALCustomize each area of your health center to make your patients feel at home. You have tons of decorations to choose from and when you finally manage to make it look as pretty as a picture, show it off in front of your friends! ‚óâ PLAY WITH FRIENDSConnect with your Facebook account to access your friends‚Äô Hospitals around the world. Buy, sell cures and compete with other Hospital managers. Tell them about your achievements via Google Play Games and Facebook. Please note that My Hospital is free to download and play. However, some in-game items are available and can be purchased for real money. descriptionHTML:
World’s healthiest game!

Cure your way through the quirkiest and funniest diseases in My Hospital - the ultimate simulation game where you design, manage and maintain your very own medical centre!

Create elixirs, farm and harvest your own medical plants and produce cures for hundreds of patients that need your help. It’s a world where Panacea rules and every treatment is available at your fingertips!

◉ BUILD YOUR HOSPITAL

Construct and manage your own hospital. Build doctor’s offices, diagnostic rooms, the treatment centre and laboratories. Expand and upgrade your hospital and share it with friends!

◉ CREATE UNIQUE CURES

Farm and harvest plants with healing properties, produce dozens of elixirs, and blend syrups to treat more than 80 funny diseases. Whether it’s a chilli throat condition, frozen hands or slimey lungs, you’ll be sure to find the cure! Unlock new remedies, treatment rooms and new conditions with every level and complete fun challenges!

◉ DECORATE YOUR HOSPITAL

Customize each area of your health center to make your patients feel at home. You have tons of decorations to choose from and when you finally manage to make it look as pretty as a picture, show it off in front of your friends!

◉ PLAY WITH FRIENDS

Connect with your Facebook account to access your friends’ Hospitals around the world. Buy, sell cures and compete with other Hospital managers. Tell them about your achievements via Google Play Games and Facebook.

Please note that My Hospital is free to download and play. However, some in-game items are available and can be purchased for real money.

Like us on Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/myhospital

Follow Cherry Pick Games
http://www.facebook.com/cherrypickgames

https://twitter.com/cherrypickgames

Having problems? Got any suggestion? We’d love to hear your feedback! Reach us at: hello@cherrypickgames.com
developerAddress: Kalevankatu 12 A 4, 00100 Helsinki, Finland
recentChanges: NEW FEATURES!
- Connect with other players! Invite in-game friends and help each other!
- Introducing Vitamins! Supplement your patients!
summary: Heal, Cure & Diagnose Patients
title: My Hospital: Build and Manage

comments: Great game!!! Still some bug's. You have to log out and log back in to collect the 5 hour daily rewards. Sometimes you can't post in the chat rooms. It will say invalid character. A lot of lag at times when you use the power and impact gauge. There needs to be more options to customize character's and or add more. I also believe the daily 5 hour rewards need to change instead of the same rewards everyday. It is a fun game, and highly addictive. Great graphics, which still could be improved on, looking at newer golf games coming out.
Great game.  Only problem is the huge 10 second warning that covers your shot.   Also the game meter jumps.  So I get penalties for taking longer than 10 seconds when I let the control bar reset.

Almost great. The UI is a crowded mess. Too much nonsense. The equipment tabs are broken due to bugs(I downloaded on several devices) making it impossible to accurately navigate between items, and the putting is rigged(obvious padding) resulting in missed shots that shouldn't happen. Besides these glaring flaws there is great potential here.

A great game easy to play and progress.  Only issue is i can't work out how to change my country from the usa to aus. Sick to death of my putts begging taken off me because you have ridiculously stupid gamer play.  If I putt a ball in real life and it hits the edge of a cup it goes in 90 pc of the time.  If I putt one to the lip of the cup in real life it goes ohm.  But bout your retarded physics.  They stop the ball on the edge or knock it away from the hole. What a load of bulls$/^. Fix this and I may consider upping the rating

I really like this game other than the BIRDS IN THE BACKGROUND!!! Shut them up PLEASE!!! It's very annoying and makes me not want to play this game I have to play it with the volume turned down so I don't have to hear the freaking BIRDS!

Fine before the update. Now it glitches and freezes. Cannot finish a round. Power bar no longer smooth. Not enjoyable to play. I wanted to quit in the middle of the round. Very disappointed in latest update. I hope this is fixed soon. This was my favorite game on mobile device ever and I want to go babe to playing it!

descriptionHTML:
Experience the first real-time, multi-player mobile golf game!

Introducing Golf Star™, the greatest golf game you’ll ever play, featuring realistic graphics, golfing techniques mastered by the pros, and a simulation powered by real physics-based gameplay. Play with golfers from all over the world!

Language support: English, 한국어, Deutsch, Français, Português, Español, 日本語, 中文简体, or 中文繁體. , Indonesia, ไทย.

* The game won't be available on some of the low-end devices that do not support Tegra 2.

* Access permission notice for gameplay
· STORAGE: The permission is required to store game data and will not access personal files such as photos.
· PHONE: The permission is required to proceed with in-game events and rewards and will not affect calls.
· CONTACTS: The permission is required to sync your friend list and Google Account.

※ You'll be able to enjoy the service except features related to above authorities even if you don't give permission to the above.

Stunning Graphics and True-to-Life Golf Physics!
- Golf Star features stunningly beautiful graphics unlike anything you've ever seen before.
- Experience the exhilaration of being on a real golf course!
- Terrain height, ball impact angle, wind, temperature, humidity, and up to 70 other factors implemented to perfectly capture the physics of a real swing.

Various Skills and Techniques
- We’ve captured the skills and techniques of real-life pro golfers.
- Become a pro golfer and choose from up to 15 techniques to use, including draw shots, fade shots, and chip shots.

Different Game Modes
- Career Mode: Play Single Player rounds and Quests, or compete in the NPC Tournament.
- Match Challenge/Tournament Mode: You can enjoy 1:1 Tournament on a real time basis with players from all around the world.
- Grand Championship: Meet the tournament score requirement to advance to a higher tournament and compete for the true master.
- Customized Tournament: You can be the host of a tournament! Customize your own tournament and award prizes to attending players.
- Skins Mode: Max. of 4 players will compete against each other to win each hole, and the winner will earn the prize money.

World Championship
- Participate in the weekly World Championship Match and claim victory to win awesome rewards!
- Win all the major tournaments for the ultimate grand slam!

Golf Tournaments!
- Play a new tournament every week and win prizes.
- Become the world’s greatest Pro Golfer, and achieve the Grand Slam.

Guild System
- Create a Guild with users from all over the world!
- Complete Guild Missions all together with your Guild Members and acquire various items from the Guild Shop!
- Enjoy competing against other Guilds in the Guild Battle League!

Daily Mission System
- Complete various missions every day to get amazing rewards.
- You can become the best player by completing the missions every day!

Hall of Fame
- Compete against players from all around the world and enter the Hall of Fame!

• Items are available for purchase in this game. Some paid items may not be refundable depending on the type of item.
• For Com2uS Mobile Game Terms of Service, visit http://www.withhive.com/.
- Terms of Service : http://terms.withhive.com/terms/policy/view/M9/T1
- Privacy Policy : http://terms.withhive.com/terms/policy/view/M9/T3
• For questions or customer support, please contact our Customer Support by visiting http://www.withhive.com/help/inquire

comments: I stop playing C C because I loved this game... I noticed that we use way more than we get!! And to only get a few tickets for every 10 Bingo's then having to wit for 22hrs....only 4 tickets and hr...and it takes way to long to get to the next level and when do reach it we get very little tickets!!! Dont have to many deals to get both tickets and special prizes... Also how does it when a game starts right after a tournament that I end up in the thousand plus  rank below the bronze??? As much as I love this game think its time to give it a rest until there re more incentives to bring me back!!!

My game keep freezing up and not submitting my scores not giving me boosters I acquired during that round. Please fix the issues and give me back my points and boosters. Thank you   I just played again and I played the whole game but when it's time to tally the score the game freezes. I lost 3 footballs and a treasure chest plus my points. Please respond to my issues. I haven't heard from anyone yet. But I still like the game. Just want it to stop robbing me....

This is definitely a fun bingo app. Where it's lacking or otherwise could be improved, comparatively to ther Bingo games, is the daily spin wheel & daily sign in bonus. Daily 24hr sign in should provide a much larger number of free tickets & include daily free power ups. Earning one or two power ups w a single spin of the wheel is anticlimactic! Power ups are a vital way to  daily tournament advancement, bingo wins & simy make playing more fun. Completing a pizzule is impossible without power-ups or making a purchase. However, a big win for this app. is the ability to sign in each new day to a new tournament which helps level the playing field. Special tournaments and/or the add' side bonuses, like the "turkey daub" made playing & making a purchase worth wild!

Good, keeps me coming back for more. The only thing I don't like is there is no way of getting that many puzzle pieces in the time. Could you maybe let us play till we get the Puzzle Complete to get the rewards.

I am addicted to this game. I think you should get more power ups instead of ticket's. Cause you run out of power up's. I feel you should get bingo power up's instead of ticket's. On the bonus spin they should add bingo power up's of 4. I need more bingo power up's. And would like to get power up's for daubing every number called each game. I need more power Up's. And the game should give you tickets when you get every number that is called correctly on each card every game that you play.

The new additions of the outlaws was great, but then you added all these "special" days that serve no purpose but to make people spend money. I have spent plenty already but not for every game. Sorry guys, bad move. Too greedy.

comments: I really don't care too much for bubble games but I like this one.

Come out with Upgrade 2, how many  levels? I really love this game. Great for passing time, but, we need more Freebies to keep game going, because everyone can not afford to buy. As long as we are playing you make Money, so how about helping out your players, to keep us playing? Stay blessed and be safe.

I would have given this app five stars throughout but it keeps on freezing - even though I've closed all other applications and have restarted the game several times!   This is so frustrating because it is a very good game! So am uninstalling it...

What can I tell you about this game , it's exceptional to all the other games . There's not one game that's the same they're challenging , intriguing,and most of all fun everything you want in a game .Whoever thought of this game knew what people would like to play .I applaud everyone at this company for inventing such a excellent app .Try it you won't be disappointed . Sincerely   Roselle P. Egan
I really like the game but don't buy any coin's you might not get them I bought $20.00 worth twice and they took my money and I didn't get no coins and they never answer your e-mails
Finished all levels only to find 2 weeks ago that new levels would open on 21-2-2018. It's now 22-2-2018 and still no new levels. What's going on?
description: Classic arcade bubble popping taken to a whole other level. Go coconuts and start blasting everything in sight. Get your slingshot hand ready and face down those polluting Beavers. They think they can sludge the lake unnoticed but their waste-filled trucks will be in trouble soon enough. FUN ADDICTIVE GAMEPLAYBurst and pop everything in your path and help the Forest animals shoot the lights out on those bad Beavers. Become one with the sling and master the art of shooting bubbles.SAVE YOUR FRIENDSYour friends are in need of rescue. Trapped by the evil polluting minions of Beaver Corp., only your skilled sling can break free the forest fiends from their ordeal.OFFLINE PLAYNo wifi? No data plan? No problem. Play without the need for an internet connection. Have fun anywhere you are.Use the slingshot to free your trapped friends so they can come to your rescue and help you evade obstacles.TOP FEATURES:- Awesome hand-made levels- Lots of cute animals to rescue- Fun and exciting power-ups- Great graphics- Addictive gameplay- All the bubbles you can shoot- You get to save the ForestTake up the fight today and see if you have what it takes to rescue defenseless animals.
descriptionHTML:
Classic arcade bubble popping taken to a whole other level. Go coconuts and start blasting everything in sight. Get your slingshot hand ready and face down those polluting Beavers. They think they can sludge the lake unnoticed but their waste-filled trucks will be in trouble soon enough.

FUN ADDICTIVE GAMEPLAY
Burst and pop everything in your path and help the Forest animals shoot the lights out on those bad Beavers. Become one with the sling and master the art of shooting bubbles.

SAVE YOUR FRIENDS
Your friends are in need of rescue. Trapped by the evil polluting minions of Beaver Corp., only your skilled sling can break free the forest fiends from their ordeal.

OFFLINE PLAY
No wifi? No data plan? No problem. Play without the need for an internet connection. Have fun anywhere you are.
Use the slingshot to free your trapped friends so they can come to your rescue and help you evade obstacles.

TOP FEATURES:
- Awesome hand-made levels
- Lots of cute animals to rescue
- Fun and exciting power-ups
- Great graphics
- Addictive gameplay
- All the bubbles you can shoot
- You get to save the Forest

Take up the fight today and see if you have what it takes to rescue defenseless animals.

9 Chalet Rd.
Toronto, ON, M2J 3V4
Canada
recentChanges: Expansion with New Levels!
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
summary: Pop, poke, shoot, burst and blast bubbles, blazing a path to rescue your friends
title: Forest Rescue: Bubble Pop

comments: This game is so lopsided. Long losing streaks. Waiting for 1 card to make a good meld, meanwhile my opponent is pulling them out right and left. I can be 2 points away from winning and they just pull 2 melds out of their hat for a win. Uninstalling! Make your game fun.

So... if this isn't a scam... how can I quit a game before it's over and immediately be paired with the same opponent. Every time I've had an opponent drop out, it takes a few seconds to notify me they left the game. Every day a new reason to NOT pay a cent for this fraud. I play out of sheer boredom.

Players with higher ranks should not be able to play  against players that are lower rank with less experience. Plus the ring challenge if you don't reach  the 30000 you should get the amount that it stops on, instead of 1000 points.

Want to love this game, but it just constantly cheats!! It would be more enjoyable if you could have so many free plays per log in to just enjoy some play, like other games do. Instead you run out of gems right away after being cheated out of one or two games, which really stinks!!  I'm not paying through the nose just to enjoy playing a game. You are too greedy and a big fat CHEAT King and it has really disappointed me, because the game would be great fun if I could actually play it!!!

Uninstalling...too many hiccups! Costs too much too play a simple game of cards. This game is all about making a lot of money for 'King' corporation. Can't really say anything nice about this game. Pretty much agree with the reviews. (didn't even have installed for 24 hrs.)

I agree with the cheating and everything everyone else is talking about, but I also have a problem with the automatic card shuffle in the middle of your turn. Wait for the players turn to end, then shuffle.  I have lost several games because of this.  I now have a 3 lose rule because of the way this game messes with you and then I'm out and won't play for days or weeks, because I refuse to pay for a game that cheats.

descriptionHTML:
Play the traditional card game rummy with a multiplayer twist for mobile. Set over the rooftops of 1920’s London and hosted by a group of cats, we want you to join our club and play the world at cards!

Make your way through the card clubs of Lucky Lane and play against opponents from all over the world, in this brand new live player versus player game!

There’s no closing time, it's never too late and we’re always open for business with special live events over the weekends – download now for free, and play the world at cards with Shuffle Cats!


Shuffle Cats features:
· The classic card game updated for bite-sized fun on the go!
· Live, multiplayer games with people from around the world!
· Unlock new and exciting challenges that offer inventive ways to play.
· Boost your play by using Lucky Charms against your opponent.
· Intuitive and highly polished - card games never looked so good!
· Lighthearted interaction with other players, using fun chats and live card movement.
· Easily sync your progress between your phone and tablet devices.

If you love playing Candy Crush Soda Saga or Farm Heroes Saga or you love classic card games like rummy, whist and solitaire, download Shuffle Cats now and discover an exciting new way to play card games for free on your mobile!

Visit https://care.king.com/ if you need help!

Shuffle Cats does not offer “real money gambling” or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Practice or success at social gaming does not imply future success at “real money gambling”. Internet connection required. Shuffle Cats is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.

You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Finally, a big thank you to everyone playing Shuffle Cats! See you on the rooftops!

comments: I liked the game so much. No! I love it, but it's just that I'm now on level 65 but I'm stucked since I only have few gems left and I needed to extend the time, and buy some customers which I find amazing just to save your energy and the stage but I also find it hard since I have already completed 3 stars from lower levels and why is it that I can't play the levels I have already completed? I would really suggest that lower levels would still be played just to be able to collect gems. I hope you can fix this issue though. I'm so loving this game and I'm getting addicted to it. I got stucked on level 65 on my two days of playing. Thank you

I love this game! So few games actually suck me in, but this game had me addicted right away. I play on my phone and laptop. Yes I have two different games at different levels lol. I love how upgrades are so easy and it isn't impossible to upgrade or move on. It gets challenging as you go up levels but it's so fun.

Moving on is hard on some levels because they are specifically designed for you to use gems and they are hard to come by. However, If you are patient enough you can eventually earn them. I enjoy that you don't have to drag the items to the customers. It's definitely an enjoyable and challenging game. I'm currently at a "coming soon" stage where I can no longer move ahead. I've been waiting a long time and do not want to wait forever. Please do an update soon!!!

Great game but some levels really hard I cant pasd this one level im on for days maybe update make it easier pass level I'm on I just did update...I hope so... love game anyways great game to.. identical cooking joy to map was a great game to but also hard get passed certain levels that game to n I can try play fast with my hands to still cant pass to not playing  cooking joy anymore going stick with this one see if game gets easier to

It's fun till you run out of energy. They get you too rate the game right away while you are having fun with free lives. Give you enough lives to rate it good then the lives end and you have to watch a min advert or 30 mins for one life Regen. OR PAY. They just want your money at that point. So sad.

Brilliant little time waster of a game.. yet.. once you start getting to the higher levels.. the less chance of earning gems and i aint noway paying for them.. last time I stupidly paid for gems on cooking fever..and got my account hacked into! Big lesson learnt! I do still play this alot tho so overall, definitely a good game. üëç

descriptionHTML:
PREPARE 🔪, COOK 🕑and SERVE 🍕 delicious meals from all over the world 🌎 in Cooking Madness!

Become the master chef 👨‍🍳 you have always wanted to be! This year it’s this highly addictive time management game that’ll bring you the best digital cooking experience!

Get yourself in a real cooking craze. Cook like you’re a MAD CHEF in Cooking Madness! Did the cooking fever caught on and you can’t get enough of 🍨 cooking games? Then this is THE cooking game for you! You’ll be serving delicious dishes 🍩 to hungry customers in amazing restaurants in a ⏩ FAST pace. No challenge that can’t be beaten by you.

Dash from restaurant to restaurant on this magical map. You will discover and unlock many places as you progress on your journey. 🌄 Get the restaurants back to business and attract more and more customers. Let the Cooking Madness begin!

Practice your cooking techniques and management skills 🍽. Tap as fast as you can while keeping your eye on the time. Making dishes have never been so much fun and exciting! Try all the possible kitchen appliances 🍳 to improve your cooking abilities. Upgrade dishes and kitchenware for a better gaming experience!

Love a little bit of a thrill in your cooking game? Keep up with the rush hours, become better at time management 🛎. This cooking game offers endless fun levels with challenging missions set up in each level to give you that special experience.

What more FUN things brings this game?
- Cook & Travel discover many different new restaurants 🍴
- Get Combos and Earn Huge Tips while showing off your cooking skills 💰
- Unlock New Restaurants by collecting enough key cards 🌮
- Upgrade your Kitchen and Level Up to become the famous Mad Chef! 💵
- Tap away in many fun levels 🍖
- Complete special missions and achievements to earn more🎁
- And keep an eye on many more updates to come! 🔥

If you’re a fan of casual games 🎮 such as match 3 games, puzzle games or even building games. Then you should definitely give this a 🎢 go.

Put that Chef Hat on and get cooking! Download for free today and join the Cooking Madness! ♥️

Follow us on the official fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/cookingmadness.chef

comments: Great gameIncredible game. But when you move up in lvls the cost of every detail is ludacris! I've played this game a month and spent good money on it.  I am not into waiting a half a day so I can gain a 5 min advantage, then turn around and do it again. Only this time, just wait longer! .... Or of course you could just spend be re $.... Awesome game... makers are greedy!

I'm not happy that I can only send 20 gold from my accounts to one of my accounts per day. I'd like to send more gold per day. Annoying 2 alliance war battle limit should be gotten rid of. It's annoying, expensive and takes a very long time to reach each level of the game. Overall, it's a good game to play but it can be improved

The last few days this game become completely useless and unplayable. The matchmaking has been tweaked to the point where I'm being attacked by significantly higher players, without even a possibility to retaliate! At the same time when I try to attack in quick match, the level of my opponents is being so high, that I have zero chances winning a simple attack.  I'm thinking about uninstalling this game permanently. When contacted, Zynga employee suggests to spend more money to upgrade my defenses. How is that for "humanly friendly" customer service? Horrible service.
After getting to HQ level 10 it just got so boring.  To be honest don't like the game play playing against other people either.  The play is slanted toward the attacker .  Deleted

It's quite unreasonable that the nuke is too close to other command items! So, please give me back a nuke, and 40000 fuels as well as 5000 metals for reviving robot and retraining tanks! Also put the nuke to other corners!

Game has a fun, friendly community of players. Load times kinda slow. Occational bugs and glitches. Usually following after updates. Overall though a fun game that has new features added frequently, keeping it interesting.

comments: This is one of the best rpgs out there in my opinion for a few reasons the graphics are very nice, rpgs whos graphics try to get really realistic are just not the same it looks blan likr that. My next reason is it isnt a pay to win game. For all of the people out there who like to pay a lot of money, its just dum. Money for a game should only be for cosmetic items to make you look really cool not to boost you 10 tens ahead of everyone, and for that I thank you Allstar gaming. Paying does get you a boost in game its just not very big the only reason rating s are so bad is cuz the top up didnt give them anything which is a huge bug.

I can't tell you how long I've been looking for a decent game. Literally weeks. I came acrossed this one from a Facebook add and as soon as I started playying it has been super fun every since. The p2w ratio is literally not high at all. So F2P can definitely gain just ad much. Awesome gameplay good graphics for the game itself overall I definitely recommend this game. ‚ô°

Game sucks! No control in game for cheaters. Devs don't care about the game! Hackers are top ranked over the cash players. No matter how many tickets I opened there is no response. Don't waste your time on this game, unless you wanting g to get away with cheating g.

Non auto PvP. Not enough room on a phone screen for 360 group fight. When you can't even see your toon in the dogpile of toons to know which button to hit. And you burn thru stam in higher levels in an hour

Had a question about something and got response from koram games that they want free to play players and paying members on same page! What an insult. Not to mention we can't shut off vip status I regret ever spending in this game! No gratitude for the customer we are treated like dirt. Not to mention we payers get harassed in game by free to play players daily! Show some respect to the people who give you a pay check.
At the beginning there is no setting menu to turn off the annoying music, but there is a menu to give them money for VIP status. That's all I need to know this is a cash-grab.

descriptionHTML:
Your favorite characters in a brand new adventure;
In this new world, you are our only hope!

● After 14 years, Seal Online From Korea is Back!
The classic returns!
Finally play Seal Online in multiplayer mode on your mobile – a whole new story with a brand new experience!

● 3 Classes Are Back: Knights, Priests and Jesters!
An improved world-view with more exciting levels to challenge.
Upgrade your character, choose skills, gear and train pets.
Alliance system, World Boss gameplays, Arena, Survival challenges, Magic Beanstalk, and more for you to explore!

● Hide the Cleavers! Rascal Rabbit is Back!
Train pets and take them with you – over 40 kinds, all cute yet deadly!
Ride your mount into battle; no need to tire your little legs anymore...

● Hundreds of Costumes; Dress to Impress
Wondering what to wear today? Change costumes according to your mood.
Loads of fashion and accessories to choose from. If you can imagine it, we’ve got it!

● Say Goodbye to Singledom – Let’s Get Married!
Tired of being single? Try out the in-game wedding system.
Earn intimacy points and propose to the object of your desire.
Hold a wedding banquet, choose your wedding dress and invite your friends to witness your special occasion!

Chat with players in-game using text or voice messages.
The fairest trading system around; perfect for making new friends!

descriptionHTML:
Angry Birds and Transformers collide in this action-packed, 3D shoot ‘em up adventure! The EggSpark has transformed the eggs into crazed robots who are destroying Piggy Island, but who can stop them?! Autobirds, ROLL OUT!

Have you ever seen an alien robot Angry Bird? Enter the AUTOBIRDS! This brave band of heroes features Red as Optimus Prime, Chuck as Bumblebee and… well you’ll meet the rest soon. They’ve got lasers and they turn into cars. Plus they have arms and legs – that’s a first!

But the courageous Autobirds can’t save Piggy Island on their own – to stop the EggBots they’ll need to join forces with their arch rivals the DECEPTIHOGS (like Decepticons only smellier). Can these bitter enemies team up and put aside their differences? Yeah right...

*NOTE: Angry Birds Transformers is completely free to play, but there are optional in-app purchases available.

--------------

- COLLECT! Unlock a roster of heroes (and villains) with unique attacks and abilities!

- DESTROY! Leave the slingshot at home – this time you have some SERIOUS firepower!

- VEHICLES! Oh, yes! Car, truck, tank or plane – transform to dodge falling hazards!

- UPGRADES! Get stronger weapons and new abilities for every Transformer!

- TAG TEAM! Borrow a friend’s character to unleash a devastating two-bot assault!

- TELEPODS™! Scan ‘em to unlock, revive or boost your bots!


*NOTE:
A network connection is required for some game features..
--------------

comments: Developer team should evaluate more and more about the gnome in treasure hunt, the damage dealt by the gnome is too high and the other monsters accompanying the gnome. And nowadays the prize of beating weekend boss arena is very low chance of idol and the boss really powerfull. I hope the dev team could look thia problems again. Thank you so much.

Waaah I remember a game name might and magic tactics that has cool story with this kind of gameplay and I really want to play an online one and.this is it. Tho Im not a fan of kinda kiddy characters but still I play for content of the game really happy I could play again this kind of game thank you

Developer team should consider treasure gnome strengths at beginning of stage. I lose 3 times in a row to that gnome in one hit. And additional monsters that can attack in 1 turn. Boss arena reward seems become worse, no idol at all for 3 weeks.

Ive never been a fan of having to wait for energy in games but I guess that's what makes a smart phone game addictive. Try making it so getting diamonds is a little more easy (random drops etc.) But I guess you probably get more as you level up. Opening crates gives the game a better drive and makes it more addictive. All in all a solid game though..

Drains battery too quickly. Haven't got any idols from boss arena for months. Massive chest is a dumb idea because it doesn't reward any gold at all. Lack of new areas and modes means daily boring gold grinding.

I know the Concept from Might & Magic: Clash of Heroes and I've been looking for something similar ever since I've finished it. The fact that there are four colours to combine makes it a bit trickier, as it gets less likely to easily combine three (or more) of a kind, but that makes it just a tad bit more challenging.  So far it feels like a really neat game, though I still haven't unlocked anything but the Campaign and Treasure Cave.

descriptionHTML:
Combat enemies and bosses with the creatures you collect, level up your hero powers and loot treasure from Norse legend!

Grow an army of creatures, explore the worlds of Solgard and discover the secrets of Norse legend with this epic new RPG!

Your epic team have to fight hard.DRAMATIC PvP Battles!- Prove your team‚Äôs Strength & Strategy in the 5 vs 5 battle!- Compete with other players in the leaderboard and make your way to the top of the PvP.GUILDS & COMMUNICATION!- Form a Guild with other players- Fight together and earn legendary rewards- Make your Guild the most powerful in the worldOfficial Page: http://heroesinfinity.com/
descriptionHTML:
A stunning action RPG filled with heroics, adventure, and a diverse assortment of creatures and fiends.
Dive into the world of Heroes Infinity and begin your epic journey through many lands and cities. Collect & build your epic team of heroes to achieve victory.

[ Features ]

EPIC GODS WAR
- A real-time strategy battle filled with dynamic effects and varied skill animations.
- Many heroes are waiting for you to Unlock & Combine them into a powerful team.

STRATEGIC GAMEPLAY
- Power Up, Tier Up, Rank Up, and Gear Up to prepare your heroes in their War for Justice.
- Summon your heroes wisely to gain Victory in the coming battles.

NUMEROUS GAME MODES
- Adventure Mode: Gain Experience & Level Up your heroes by defeating your enemies.
- Skyscraper: Challenge your epic team by conquering many Levels of increasing difficulty.
- Star Gates: Collect pieces of all the heroes’ shards to Summon the mystery heroes.
- Training Field: Develop your own skill with heroes in battle to gain victory.
- Boss Party: Battle with legendary bosses and gain unique rewards.
- Super Boss: Stay focused when the boss is near. Your epic team have to fight hard.

DRAMATIC PvP Battles!
- Prove your team’s Strength & Strategy in the 5 vs 5 battle!
- Compete with other players in the leaderboard and make your way to the top of the PvP.

GUILDS & COMMUNICATION!
- Form a Guild with other players
- Fight together and earn legendary rewards
- Make your Guild the most powerful in the world

Official Page: http://heroesinfinity.com/
developerAddress: Asia Square, Singapore
recentChanges: We wish you a Happy Lunar New Year!
New special hero for Lunar New Year!
- New feature: Grand Arena
- New heroes
- Open more Arena
- PvP improvement
- Bugs fixed and improvements
summary: A hard-core strategy action RPG packed 1v1 duel.
title: Heroes Infinity: Gods Future Fight

Very good game I'm hooked already.  Spent money don't get when you receive your monthly card other wise bad ass game. I will support this game any day.
Fast pace awesome graphics overall one of my favorite new games

Too much payments to be able to play continuously. Long time waiting for energy. Not much to play just upgrade the chars and hope for the best. The main objective in this game is make you pay to play.

descriptionHTML:
Enter the world of Juggernaut Wars – the world of swords, sorcery and courage pitted against the malice of otherworldly monsters and their minions; the world where fighting never ceases! Thwart the Devourers’ invasion and save the missing princess Leah! Dozens of heroes with unique abilities and personalities are on your side. It will take a real master of tactics to assemble a team that would overcome all obstacles, defeat powerful bosses and reach the grand finale to shape the destiny of this world!
The enemy is guarding the secrets well, but every victory makes your team stronger! Upgrade your heroes, collect artefacts, gather new warriors! Prove your skills in the campaign as well as other modes – no matter what, you’ll never get bored!

- Outstanding graphics and special effects! Heroes of Juggernaut crush everything in their way in most spectacular battles!
- An exciting campaign: unravel the Cult of Masks’ secrets and save the world from the Devourers!
- A multitude of modes: from arenas to side scenarios and mine assaults, your heroes will always have work to do!
- Limitless combat tactics options: use your heroes’ abilities skillfully and win!
- Friends and enemies await you online! Find allies and defeat competitors on your path to the top of the rating!

comments: Lovely relaxing gam. I enjiuy it...so far. Now i'm at 115,  got the puzzle pieces to go to 116 but it's not taking me there,why? Is there not a next level? I am in the 3rd stage and i went to update the game as it keeps freezing, and now I'm back at 115! And if i read the reviews here i am not the only one that has this problem. And seems you guys don't care. I will defnitely rate this minus 1!!!! 28.12.2017

Submitted a report yesterday and you made out I was lying. I've submitted 2 reports since then with no reply.  When I pass a level my ticket count is not going up I'm now at the gate that is telling me I need a 100 tickets its pointless me going over other levels as the ticket has not increased. I was told to tell you when I'm at the gate, which I have done twice. Still ignored.  I really likes the game until this happened.

A fantastic match-3 game for all ages. Kudos to the creator of this game. How about coming out with a Rio 2: Match 3 Party? I'm not even close to the end on this one, if there is an end.  Just asking basically if it had been thought about. More levels are great too, with more birds. Love these critters. Thanks!!!

Love this cute and challenging game but with all of these types there should be an option to turn off auto hints.. Really annoying and I like to figure out the next move myself.. Same thing with the constant tutorial, match 3 isn't rocket science... Otherwise great job!!!

GREAT GAME, ADDICTIVE, LOVE IT!!!!!! HOWEVER, I have completed the first 2 locations, got the tickets that I need to proceed on the third location, but the game won't load the other levels... It keep saying i need atleast 77 tickets... I have 120 of them. I have uninstalled & reinstalled the game THREE TIMES but I am STILL stuck waiting. FIX THIS ASAP, PLEASE

descriptionHTML:
It’s Carnival time in Rio, and Blu is planning the most amazing party in all of Brazil! He invited all of his friends, including Jewel, Pedro and Nico. Everybody is expecting the fun to start at any minute, but Blu isn’t ready yet!

Help Blu get everything he needs to throw an awesome party by solving puzzles, collecting medals, and unlocking new locations and party favors. Play beautiful levels of Match 3 gameplay set across stunning Brazilian landscapes. Have fun with all of your favorite characters from the hit movies or play against your friends!

***PUZZLE PARADISE***
Match, crush and swipe your way through hundreds of levels set within glorious locations, like the Amazon Jungle, Rio City and Copacabana Beach, with new ones being added all the time!

***MEET YOUR NEW FEATHERY FRIENDS***
Collect all of your favorite characters from the Rio universe including Jewel, Nigel, Nico and others!

***PLAN THE BEST PARTY IN THE WORLD***
Progress by earning tickets and unlocking new levels! Upgrade your map with balloons, banners, confetti and a DJ Stage!

Unlock super abilities by collecting gold and unleashing the power of the birds! Each character has their own unique special abilities, so which one will you choose?

***PARTY WITH FRIENDS***
Login with Facebook to send and receive gifts to your friends! See their progression on the map and compete in tournaments to win prizes!

comments: I enjoy this game. graphics are pretty good for mobile game. By lvl 30ish though its gets grindy and there are some quest where the quest items are so hard to get.   I just wish the skill and stat descriptions gave more detail. I had to dig through the forum and googls to find info (if any) of certain stat and skill effects. Overall fun game.

I dont know if it has PVP.. Im still starting to explore this.. so far, I like it.. It's just the skill is somehow hard to click as you need to click the list first.. It would be really great if it is displayed on the lower right around the map.. instead of attack tab, skill tab should be separated each specialty :)
This is the best RPG game for mobile! It worth downloading it. They only have minor bugs but take a long time to load the data when you start playing it for the first time. Still, I LOVE THIS GAME

Its ok but for anyone thats new to a rpg game will get lost because some important tutorials aren't included in the beginning that should be. Like stat distribution and how to enhance your skills. Fixing that will make the game a bit more user-friendly.

Toram is very addictive and fun, the people that made this are awesome. but, later on I can't seem to open the game. It just keeps crashing, I really love this game. I tried uninstalling and installing, but it didn't work. pls show me how to fix this problem.

This game worked fine on my galaxy s8 prior to the last update. Now all i get is errors about memory not responding and the game closes. Game was enjoyable. Until the issue is resolved, this review is mostly negative.

comments: I'm honestly about to uninstall. I've been playing 3 days and it's making it impossible to complete the daily task. I can't even invite friends... Edit: it won't allow me to invite friends, I'm able to play one game a day unless I continuously buy more tokens...but with ads after every game, they get funding from them. I installed this game because the reviews were the best, but maybe it's just got a grudge against me!

I understand they are trying to make money off this app, but if you are going to charge someone 320 tickets to play 4 cards, the reward should be more than 70 tickets per win.  I mean, really?! Some people want to play bingo, but want something to work toward without being bored.  I played Bingo story and deleted it, because I had a lot of credits, but EVERY BOARD WAS THE SAME.  Also, the powerups in this game should be limited to what you have available, and not have to purchase because you are out of said power up.  It might make more people play if they are rewarded.  .  I mean the quests saying you will win 600 tickets if you complete the quest, but you're spending on the normal side 280+ tickets, really?  And no other options besides watching ad videos for free credits?  And I'm not saying to add a "download this app and run it for 3 tickets.  Reach level 300 for 40 tickets."  Rant over

Everything would be pretty neat, but there should be another way to get more tickets. I've been stuck at the New York state for several days now, cause I can only replay the first stages with the tickets from the daily bonus.
Love it. The only reason I didn't give 5's across the board is it gets costly per game as you gain levels. The games are way fun and you can play up to 8 cards !!!!!

There should be more ways to get or win more tickets and power-ups. I also think the costs per cards increases too much from board to board. Other than those two issues, I love this game. Would play more if there were other ways to get/win tickets, the purchase costs is ridiculous for the middle/working-class.  I'd rather pay my bills than buy fake in-game tickets that CAN'T win me REAL CASH. Thank you keep up the good work.
It's a fun game. You have to be quick near the end beacause the game seem to end while the caller is still calling the last number. You don't get a penalty for daubing the wrong number.

comments: Love this game. Second time I've played it. At level 46 I unlocked the whistles, at level 90 I finished the first puzzle, at level 95, I got my first carousel, at level 100 I had unlocked everything except the puppies...still need red puppy, at level 101 I got my first ferris wheel, at level 105 I got the first swinging ride, at level 121 I unlocked tier 7 & at lvl 130 I finished 2nd puzzle. Only thing I hate is the adds popping up as I touch the board, so it goes to the game & I have to exit. Edit: third time playing. March 2018. So much has changed!!! Quests, boxes, keys & now my game is saved...had to start from scratch but wont lose it again!!!

I've run 2 other apps to get bonus coins both at almost 1k each and I never got my coins. I finished the tutorial like it said I had to but zero coins were given for it. U shouldn't offer free coins to run other apps if u aren't going to give the coins for it. Will probably give up and delete bc of it.  Tried to give it a 2nd chance and did the flash light purchase to get 2268 coins and never got my coins. Why offer free coins if u won't give the free coins?  I emailed like recommend and sent proof like requested and still nothing. I smell a lawsuit for false advertisement. My $4.99 spend on a flashlight is going to make me thousands. Thanks for not doing ur job.

Extreme amount of ad pop ups. Usually loses dollars and coins. Fun but with all the flaws its not worth it. I played so far and it started over out of nowhere. Can't load or anything. Waste of my time

It's is nearly impossible to play because of the amount of pop-ups. In one minute, I counted 15 pop-ups. Even if you aren't touching the screen, whilst waiting on coins, it jumps from advertisement to advertisement. A decent game ruined by pop-ups.

It has its moments. With the abundance of ads present and the fact that the game gives notifications for things you cant get and the forced instructions at times it is a okay game but pretty boring after a while.

I really enjoy this game..I  originally began playing to earn credits for another game but drifted past level 7,which was the required level I intended to complete and stop playing. Next thing I knew I was clicking away, determined to get the next cute "prize," down the centre aisle. I looked up to see I was at level 10! Geez! I knew I was hooked when I found myself looking at my coin balance..found it satisfactory...smiling...i forgot my original game...now that's an addictive game!! Lol! I blame the cute puppy dog prize that lured me with its overwhelming cuteness..

This is a fascinating game where you're a concubine battling it out with the thousands upon thousands of other concubines (players) vying for the emperor's affection. The YouTube ads are a bit misleading, and don't represent actual gameplay. Most of the game involves you getting an army of souls of historical  figures so you can fight other people's armies to continue the story  or get crucial items that will help level up your army. There's the option to slap/curse people, but most of the existing players apparently take this game WAY too seriously, and you can cause party wars and get disowned by your own party just by ÂÆÆÈ¨• ing easily offended people, which is pretty dumb since this game actively encourages you to do it. I've been told and reprimanded (?!?!?) to "play nice so everyone can have a good time," which defeats the purpose and entertainment of this game...? There's definitely many layers to this game, and a complete time-suck (usually takes me about 2-3 hours of daily gameplay to finish all the missions to get the daily rewards). Very entertaining (and would be more entertaining if most of the players had thicker skin and don't flip out and try to get you destroyed in the game just because their avatar looks bruised for like an hour after a slapping).
Ever sinve the latest update, my phone has been constantly overheated.

comments: Perty good Edit: We're in the middle of an event and the game won't load. Finally says down for maintenance. It would be nice to get a heads up on when that happens. Gonna put a hindrance on the event that's over on Friday. Do hope it's resolved soon. Still like the game tho, but would like it better if I can play.

Well a very basic game, as any other idle game. Has no real extra things that would wow you. Notifications less than a minute after closing the app (or simply pressing home) can get very annoying. As if I need a notification to tell me I closed the game.

Right.  First off, If you are not a fan of Idle games, then don't play. This is the epitome of an Idle game.   The Early game is pretty simple. Click, Collect, Make your way to Level 80. You have the option to buy gold, but I wouldn't bother.   Multiplyers come from a variety of Sources, and regular events give permanent boosts to the Main game.   Good to pick up and play for 10 minutes at different points of the day, Deep enough to just about keep my intrest beyond this.   Issues. Events: They keep adding new things to Events and not really following up on them. Betting hasn't been used in a while, Costumes are confusing, and the card collection in a previous event was a fairly obvious cash grab, requiring that upgrade the cards you have using gold.  Event's are often straight copy pastes of previous events, and will sometimes continue to reference previous events'  All in, pretty good.

Well guess they deleted my last post cause I complained that the game took up 1.8 gig till I uninstalled it and reinstalled it then lost my saves because of bad programming.   Don't waste your time or money on this company.

One of the best "tap" games. Love the satirical theme. Who would have thought that politics and money were SO interconnectedüòÅ. Just to be clear to some, I AM being sarcastic!!!! Great time waster. And that's NOT fake news.

They put so many buttons to purchase things ion the main screen. When tapping as is the nature of the game, it brings up confirmation for your purchases. If you're trying to play fast, you could easily spend $20 in mere seconds without noticing. Put all the purchases in one place instead of cheating players.
description: Build the best democracy that money can buy in this innovative political idle game! Enlist the help of lobbies in order to raise money for your political campaigns. However, lobbies won‚Äôt be enough to get you to the top by themselves. Recruit staffers to help generate revenue and woo endorsements from top politicians for unique and powerful bonuses.Tap your way from a lowly campaign volunteer up to the highest office in the land!KEY FEATURES:*Political Tapping Fun - With tons of way to earn money and rise to new and more powerful offices, how you go about doing it is up to you. Do you concentrate on tapping for cash, pay staffers to do it for you, or focus on powerful political lobbies to passively generate money while you‚Äôre offline?*Deep Strategy - Deciding which party to run for or which lobbies to invest in is just the tip of the iceberg. Retire from your campaigns in order to score coveted political capital that you can spend on endorsements from powerful party leaders.*Tons of Content - Unlock dozens of powerful upgrades that open up even more possibilities to play the game any way you want. Love achievements? There are oodles of trophies just waiting to be collected!Please Note: Pocket Politics is a free-to-play game, but some extra game items can be purchased for real money. You can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.
descriptionHTML:
Build the best democracy that money can buy in this innovative political idle game!

Enlist the help of lobbies in order to raise money for your political campaigns. However, lobbies won’t be enough to get you to the top by themselves. Recruit staffers to help generate revenue and woo endorsements from top politicians for unique and powerful bonuses.Tap your way from a lowly campaign volunteer up to the highest office in the land!

KEY FEATURES:

*Political Tapping Fun - With tons of way to earn money and rise to new and more powerful offices, how you go about doing it is up to you. Do you concentrate on tapping for cash, pay staffers to do it for you, or focus on powerful political lobbies to passively generate money while you’re offline?

*Deep Strategy - Deciding which party to run for or which lobbies to invest in is just the tip of the iceberg. Retire from your campaigns in order to score coveted political capital that you can spend on endorsements from powerful party leaders.

*Tons of Content - Unlock dozens of powerful upgrades that open up even more possibilities to play the game any way you want. Love achievements? There are oodles of trophies just waiting to be collected!

Please Note: Pocket Politics is a free-to-play game, but some extra game items can be purchased for real money. You can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

title: Pocket Politics

comments: Took me a very long time, but I beat this game and absolutely loved it! I can't wait for the next chapter!  Please keep updating and adding new things! My only suggestion is maybe if someone takes the time to watch an ad for a lavastone maybe give them 2 or something those ads are long lol

I do really like this game. But I have to admit I do not think it is as good as the other virtual villager games. Looks fantastic but it's missing the schools and other things. I miss being able to get a master doctor. I also think compared to the other games. The tech points are harder to get and it's not as fun or exciting upgrading in this game as it was with the other games.. I still enjoy it but I just feel like it's missing something.

I love this series. One thing I would like to say is things should happen at a set time or after you finish something. I still have 4 puzzles that I am no closer to finishing then I was a week ago. But these games are fun and are a great way to pass the time. I actually play it on my laptop so it's a little easier for me.

I love the game so much! I have played every other virtual villagers game and I love all of them; they are the best games ever. It's really challenging to get items that you need so you can complete a puzzle. It took me forever to finish chapter 1, but I finally finished 3 months ago, so now I'm waiting for chapter 2. It's really fun. Although it took forever to get the box to decorate the tree and to get the crab, but they were not as difficult as trying to get the pan to pan the gold because I couldn't see where it's location was and I looked everywhere, but I ended up finding it. Then there was the problem with trying to get the gold, becase the pan disappeared after getting the first gold. It was difficult to find the location to get the other two gold nuggets because I couldn't tap the area to find it, I could only find it by dropping a villager on it ( again I don't know where the location is) to get the gold. But I ended up finding them and in a way it was actually pretty fun for me to try and get the gold because it was challenging, but it did take forever. All'in'all it's a really good game; I just suggest (for the sake of other players) to make it possible to find the pan and the location to get the gold. I still love the game and I can't wait for chapter 2, and I hope for more in the future, you guys are the best so keep up the good work.  Thanks for the great game.

Game has no instructions, no way of knowing what needs to be crafted etc,  huts can only be built when technology is learnt, and then no huts are used? Etc love shack and crafting... there are certain things you CANT pick up despite being told you can... no way of lighting the fire, no way of mixing herbs without water, but you have water in the craft hut?   No way of catching butterflies... i relised a giant octopus that sits and dose nothing..lolol crazy game massive improvements needed hence the 3 stars...

I really  like  this game and all the villager games, also virtual families  2. I'm  disappointed  that  I  had to start over because of an upgrade issue that was not fixed. I lost all my progress. Luckily  I didn't  lose the heron and lemur that I paid for. Customer services  could use improvement .
description: ** Please note: this game requires an active internet connection! ** Return to the famed and mystical island of Isola and be drawn into the latest sequel in the beloved Virtual Villagers series! In the wake of a volcanic terror on the neighboring island of Asura, a family has made their way to Isola, seeking a new home. As their boat lands on the beach, they are greeted by a strange man and begin to explore this mysterious new world. The beautiful and curious island of Isola was once a paradise home to a thriving civilization but has gone to ruin and untamed jungle. The twists and turns will leave you discovering new, interactive, magical moments at every turn! Here are some of the amazing features we can‚Äôt wait to share!! - Be the master of your own village: With real-time simulation, the ability to customize your villagers‚Äô names and game-changing, random island events, no two tribes will ever be quite the same!- Train villagers to become proficient at various skills to perform tasks around the island and survive their new-found world.- Explore the charmed island to solve all-new puzzles, and uncover mysterious island secrets.- Gather and combine resources from around your new virtual home to craft rare resources and unlock rewards from completed collections.- Breed, heal and care for your beloved village children and families; build a sustainable village up from ruins; unlock improved food sources with farming and fishing; craft unique resources for puzzles and collections; and so much more! - Power-up villagers with magical necklaces, and improve productivity, life expectancy and much more for your entire village with magical totems and potions!- Acquire homes for two unique island pets that will help weed out pests and discover magical items around the island. - Reincarnate cherished villagers with all their skills.- Earn daily rewards! Also available in the Last Day of Work franchise:- Virtual Villagers Series (Origins, A New Home, New Believers, Lost Children, Secret City and The Tree of Life) - Virtual Families 2 Series- Virtual Town- Fish Tycoon Series- Plant Tycoon- San Francisco Zoo
descriptionHTML:
** Please note: this game requires an active internet connection! **

Return to the famed and mystical island of Isola and be drawn into the latest sequel in the beloved Virtual Villagers series! In the wake of a volcanic terror on the neighboring island of Asura, a family has made their way to Isola, seeking a new home. As their boat lands on the beach, they are greeted by a strange man and begin to explore this mysterious new world.

The beautiful and curious island of Isola was once a paradise home to a thriving civilization but has gone to ruin and untamed jungle. The twists and turns will leave you discovering new, interactive, magical moments at every turn!

Here are some of the amazing features we can’t wait to share!!

- Be the master of your own village: With real-time simulation, the ability to customize your villagers’ names and game-changing, random island events, no two tribes will ever be quite the same!
- Train villagers to become proficient at various skills to perform tasks around the island and survive their new-found world.
- Explore the charmed island to solve all-new puzzles, and uncover mysterious island secrets.
- Gather and combine resources from around your new virtual home to craft rare resources and unlock rewards from completed collections.
- Breed, heal and care for your beloved village children and families; build a sustainable village up from ruins; unlock improved food sources with farming and fishing; craft unique resources for puzzles and collections; and so much more!
- Power-up villagers with magical necklaces, and improve productivity, life expectancy and much more for your entire village with magical totems and potions!
- Acquire homes for two unique island pets that will help weed out pests and discover magical items around the island.
- Reincarnate cherished villagers with all their skills.
- Earn daily rewards!

Also available in the Last Day of Work franchise:
- Virtual Villagers Series (Origins, A New Home, New Believers, Lost Children, Secret City and The Tree of Life)
- Virtual Families 2 Series
- Virtual Town
- Fish Tycoon Series
- Plant Tycoon
- San Francisco Zoo
developerAddress:
2269 Chestnut Street #310
San Francisco, CA 94123
recentChanges: Bug fixes and network improvements.
summary: Craft, build, farm, breed and solve puzzles in a village right in your pocket!
title: Virtual Villagers Origins 2

comments: I enjoy playing! Daily Quest could be better. (I don't get the daily magic wheel) But they have events to earn stuff. And I absolutely love my lil pets and their powers üòä and the ingame friends I have are helpful. edited: I completed a purchase and did not recieve anything like the quest said I would. Also developers never responded to my email regarding something else. I've spent $40 bucks on this game in the 1st few days I've been playing and I think I'll keep my lil money to myself now since they haven't fixed the issue.

Would give 5 stars but after you get to a certain level you have to spend real money to get farther. I have spend 65 dollars on this game so far and have been scammed so many times. Its a super fun game but so hard to get anywhere. You should be able to stock up shields. Also its stupid that you have to pay to talk. I might get the VIP if some things changed.

The problem I have is you haven't given the radio toy for the bear and also you can't unfreeze the guy because you don't give out the items to do it even after defeating the monster. You still can't get enough fire logs plus still no radio toy for the bear? Plus should give more coins it is a lot in higher levels

Losing some snowballs...... Would like to get more than six spins in one hour..... especially when there are large amounts needed to buy..... Mining pigs....really so much when we pay large amounts and our pay is so low.....

I helped my friend defeating leonardo.i used 10 bombs .but when i attacked leonardo .there was still 1 % left .so someone else had complited it.and now i went there to claim reward there was no reward for me.i have not claimed that reward. 2nd thing you have made puzzle number 9 so much rare not even me but everyone is not getting it. Please fix this.i will give 5 stars back.

Loved this game my planet gets distroyed everyday once I almost get it built. I played several times all day. Loved this game. I used to get angels but not any more. Been on same island for weeks. I love building my planet so fun. But not getting distroyed a minutes later. I've noticed alot of my friends stopped playing too due to same problem. üò•

descriptionHTML:
***Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers***

Piggy:" Lords and Ladies, one of your friends just attacked your island, you must commit revenge! Spin the wheel to earn more gold and shields!" --Invite your Facebook friends to join Piggy Boom!

Build your exclusive islands of your own with the help of little cute pets, push the button and spin the wheel, win some luck today!

Have fun with other players and steal their gold, protect your island from invasion with your pets

▶Features
• Magic Wheel
Every one loves having some luck in a game and Piggy Boom gives you free daily chances to spin the wheel and win heaps of coins!

• Theme islands
Every casual game players love to build and have a customized avatar!
In Piggy Boom, hundreds of themed islands wait for you to unlock them and build. The more you build, the more islands you will have


• Play with Friends
Invite your best friends and compete with global players. Are you under attack and want a revenge? Call your friends and attack together.

• Miner System
Be a miner and keep digging, a rich gold mine is waiting for you to explore in the game! Become the richest player in the game for a second.

• Cute Pets
Get your daily dose of cuteness with your adorable pets and protect your island together. Remember to feed your cute pet and level it up.

More features for you to find in Piggy Boom. Join us today and play with millions players all over the world!

NOTICE: Items are available for purchase in the game.

In process of the game, we may need permissions listed as below:
1. WRITE/READ EXTERNAL STORAGE
We use this permission to help players send their screenshots to us, in cases when bugs have occurred. This helps us locate where the problem is and solve it.
2. READ/RECEIVE/SEND SMS
We use this permission to verify the identities of users, retrieve accounts, guarantee the safety of accounts, and allow players to share the game to friends at the same time.
3. RECORD_AUDIO
We use this permission to allow players to audio chat in the game.
------------------------------------------
Find us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PiggyBoomApp/

comments: Fun, easy to play, complex to reach higher levels, this game has, so far, been great. No microtransactions (thus far) to continue playing, which is a huge plus. A few have stated a couple of bugs, which I agree with, adding only one other comment; I do wish their was an offline option for at least some gameplay. Online still necessary for a lot, but offline to run some dungeons. This could, in theory, help with some server space, as well.

This game is one of the best game I ever played in mobile. I love the graphic which is cute and there is so many content, so it's not boring. And another positive side, you can get the special currency easily in the game. It's not a p2w games ^^ but the sign board was one of the best micro transaction I've ever seen. Try it and you'll see.. it's a lot of fun ^^

I've been looking for a game like this for ages! I was a fan of Runestone Keeper and wanted something similar for my phone. These guys knocked it out of the park. I rarely spend money on phone games, but these guys deserve every penny and accolade coming their way. Fun and  simple, yet brilliant in execution and design. Tons of content already, and I can't wait to see what's next. Keep up the great work!

This game is so much fun! My only complaint is that the gear is gone when done with the maze, so you start it over. As well as "learning new titles". It gets kinda old having to start that over every time you beat a full maze. But that aside, this game is definitely addictive! Keep up the great work!

Your game is amazing. You guys are amazing. After everything you went through, you deserve these stars at the very least. Your game isn't pay to win, it's just a grand experience and I love it.  One of the BEST games on the market easily.  Keep up the good work, you're all doing fantastic.  Respect

I've been playing like nine months and it's very addictive you really grow and have many choices. It's truly free to play and gems are everywhere. Buying a signboard for real money is the best bang for your buck and a lizard if you feel like buying something else.  Totally recommend it. I only hate getting creator gumball is so expensive other than that it's a great game. It's a game that goes as fast or as slow as you feel like playing.

descriptionHTML:
Brand new Adventure & RPG game of 2018. FREE to Play Now! (Game for free)

DESCRIPTION
This is a mysterious adventure. How long can you survive during the unknown journey? Enter the Gumballs & Dungeons!Start off a great adventure with world wide players,lead your Swordsman,Demon Hunter,Mage and Death Knight to beat the Evil Dominator of the Erathia continent.

FEATURES
● Explore the Gumballs & Dungeons with world wide players,challenge friends and check leaderboards and achievements
● Experience more than 12 different game maps and hidden stages, including Magic Forest, Sage's Tower, Dracula's Castle, Skeleton Island ...
● Build and upgrade your GUMBALL Fleet,go to the celestial city, challenge world wide players and win resources to upgrade your fleet.
● Collect powerful new gumballs and upgrade existing ones,including Mage, Swordsman, Odin, Vampire,Zombie ...
● Upgrade your Alchemist Workshop which can produce coins and resources constantly
● You can also read many wonderful stories that have more than 100,000 words in the game

SUPPORT
Are you having problems? Visit http://qcplay.helpshift.com/a/gumballs-dungeons or https://www.facebook.com/gumballs.dungeons or contact us in game by going to Settings > Guide.

Forums & Guide:
English: https://goo.gl/ecChhs

Wiki:
http://gdmaze.wikia.com

Terms of Service:
http://rs.qcplay.com/html/Terms_of_service.html

It's necessary to use the below permissions:

RECORD_AUDIO
There is a 'Voice Chat' function in the game, this function allows users to send the voice messages to each other, so it's necessary to use the RECORD_AUDIO permission.
The video below shows how it works in the game:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KqNb75QXq8g&feature=youtu.be

GET_ACCOUNTS
In order to allow users to sign in the game with Google account, it's necessary to grant access to the GET_ACCOUNTS permission when signing in with google at the first time.

Great idle game that you can play as much or as little as you want, even if you only have a few minutes. My only gripe is all the inactive guilds. Finding a guild with an active guild master is virtually impossible, and when the gm quits all guild upgrading is over. It's also frustrating that all the upgrades you earn for a guild stay with the guild so if your guild master comes back after 6 months and kicks you, you get to start from scratch with no bonuses.

description: The highly anticipated AAA title War of Warship is the latest in a series of free-to-play, historical online combat games to be added to the wargames portfolio. Command history's most iconic war vessels as you build your own massive naval fleet. Level up important tech modules and prepare to dominate the oceans!With four classes of ship, a myriad of upgrades and strategically designed environments, the action never ends. Every match is a unique experience. Hours of strategy, tactical gameplay and pulse-pounding combat await all who take the helm in War of Warships!= Features =Construction of naval base!All over the world can build a naval base, you also need to defend against enemy attacks.Naval construction!Build a powerful naval fleet, more than 20 kinds of types of warships.Form huge Alliances!Join players from around the world, make friends and become allies. There is strength in numbers, so you can work together and take on others in exciting campaign.World War!As you get stronger, you can wage war on other countries and occupied them.Research cutting edge technology!Research new technologies, new equipment and can build warships. Leading technology has a great impact on the entire country.
descriptionHTML:
The highly anticipated AAA title War of Warship is the latest in a series of free-to-play, historical online combat games to be added to the wargames portfolio. Command history's most iconic war vessels as you build your own massive naval fleet. Level up important tech modules and prepare to dominate the oceans!

With four classes of ship, a myriad of upgrades and strategically designed environments, the action never ends. Every match is a unique experience. Hours of strategy, tactical gameplay and pulse-pounding combat await all who take the helm in War of Warships!

= Features =

Construction of naval base!
All over the world can build a naval base, you also need to defend against enemy attacks.

Naval construction!
Build a powerful naval fleet, more than 20 kinds of types of warships.

Form huge Alliances!
Join players from around the world, make friends and become allies. There is strength in numbers, so you can work together and take on others in exciting campaign.

World War!
As you get stronger, you can wage war on other countries and occupied them.

Research cutting edge technology!
Research new technologies, new equipment and can build warships. Leading technology has a great impact on the entire country.

comments: It's enjoyable enough but the prices are an absolute joke. I usually spend quite a bit of money on apps, so I was all set to buy the premium package, expecting it to be between 2 and 4 quid a month. This is absolutely ridiculous - almost ¬£10 a month, as if the game isn't already dripping with ads. It's greedy.
The cost for extra packs is unbelievably expensive! I would not pay more than 10.00 TOTAL. Also every day you should get 3 hints and 2 hints for solving each game

One of the best free apps out there. Almost every puzzle seems overwhelming, but if you skip the ones you don't know, and solve the ones you do know, it starts filling in the blanks and most of the time you can solve the whole puzzle with no hints. Fun game!
Good game but over $20 per month is WAY beyond my budget. Too bad as I was hooked until I saw the price. Please contact me if you ever lower the cost to a reasonable amount. :(
This is one of the most   addictive games I've ever played!! Keeps me up for hours, even when I have an extremely hard time keeping my eyes open!  I could play 24/7, it's that much fun!!

Love this game! Would give it 5 stars if the paid piece wasn't subscription based and so expensive. 20 bucks per month is ridiculous, wish it was more affordable so I could support the developers. Once I finish the free section I will have to uninstall.
